choices: A Redhead in glasses, holding a bottle of green liquid
A short Asian student,  holding a remote control
A tall black haired beauty, holding a bottle of pills
A powerful looking Brunette, holding a syringe
Someone Else...
1.content:
"Sir, we're ready for you now!"

You are startled awake after falling asleep in the waiting room by the cute blonde receptionist and stand up quickly to your feet. You didn't want to leave a bad impression, since it was a miracle you were even considered for this in the first place. It's been a few weeks since you had last had steady work, and money was running tight. Luckily, you came across an ad in the paper that a company nearby was looking for volunteers. "No restrictions to apply, No experience needed, very high pay for one week's participation in groundbreaking study" was all you needed to see to get your ass into the building.

The receptionist was a very cute blonde girl in her 20's. She said her name was Kaylee, or Kelly, or something like that. You weren't really paying attention. She walks you into a white room, very reminiscent of a walk-in clinic. There are machines on the walls that monitor heartrate, blood pressure, all those sorts of things. And you have a feeling some of the more interesting items such as the test tubes and needles of various size may come into play as well. Good thing you don't have a fear for that sort of thing.

The receptionist quickly goes over a standard checkup. Heartrate, Weight, Height, that sort of thing. And just as she wraps up she has you sign a release form. The form itself is MUCH longer than you'd anticipated and you make it about halfway through before she chimes in "Umm, the experiment is scheduled to begin soon. So if you could hurry up and sign it now, that would be great. I'll make you a copy so you can read it later if you'd like." You figure that's for the best and quickly turn to the back and sign away.

She smiles as she takes the paper and says "Great. Just wait right here, and the experiment will begin momentarily." She starts to walk away but you ask her before she leaves exactly what it is you signed up for. She bites her lip and says "I'm not authorized to discuss the specifics. But i CAN tell you it's going to give you a much BIGGER perspective." You look at her in a confused manner. She just giggles and says "You'll see." And without another word, she leaves the room, talking to someone outside. You can hear them conversing for a few minutes, but can't quite make out distinct voices or words. And after a few short minutes, the door reopens, and you see who is going to give you your test:
1.title: Sign Here, Please.

choices: "Apply some of it to the skin." (You lose a few inches)
"Take a small sip." (You shrink to half your size)
"Drink one half of the bottle."  (You drop down to six inches tall)
"Drink a majority of the contents" (You shrink to about an inch tall)
"Drink all of it." (Nothing happens)
11.content:
A pretty redhead comes in wearing a bright white labcoat with a green shirt and jeans underneath. She smiles at you and "Hello, i'm Professor Jennifer Freeman. You can call me Jenny if you'd like." You shake her hand and have a seat as she takes down some notes. Without looking up at you she says "Now did they tell you what the experiment would be about today?" You said you overheard the secretary say something about mass displacement but you weren't sure exactly what she meant. The professor looks up at you and says "Okay, here's what's going to happen. We've been working on a compound for the past few years that we're convinced could compact a living organism's genetic structure. Or in layman's terms... make it smaller." You are a bit thrown back by this and you ask what she means by smaller. She raises an eyebrow and says very plainly "Exactly what it sounds like. Tinier. Littler. Less big. But on the plus side, since the body is being compacted, you'll be a little bit denser. So you'll be a lot tougher." You take all this in and ask how she's going to do it exactly and she says "With this" and pulls out of her coat pocket a small vial of glowing green liquid.

You ask what exactly is going to happen next and she says "Well, first i'm going to take down some recordings. We need to examine exactly how small you're going to get when you interact with the compound." She reaches into her bag and pulls out a small electronic tape recorder and presses the big glowing "R" button. She talks into it just like one would a phone. "Experiment number one is ready to commence. Patient is in good physical health, mental capacity is at normal levels, and by all means he's not bad looking either." You laugh a bit at her overall playful tone for the experiment, but you're slammed back to reality when she places a rubber glove on and begins to uncork the beaker. She hands the vial over to you and says "Patient is accepting the compound now, and i'm instructing him to..."
11.title: Professor Freeman's Potion

choices: "A few hours... there's not enough time to reverse it!"
"A few days... We can reverse it if we work fast!"
"A few weeks... We have plenty of time to fix this."
111.content:
She looks at you expectantly, and you respond by tipping the formula slightly in your hand, letting a small drop land on your hand. You put the bottle down and rub it into the skin slowly, until it completely dissipates. Within a matter of seconds you feel the spot where you poured the formula start to tingle, and then that tingling sensation stretches all the way across your body. In a flash, you feel your clothes become slightly looser, and the world around you jump up just a little bit. You’ve shrunk a few inches! Freeman beams a bright smile at you and steps right up next to you, placing a hand on her forehead and matching it up with hers. She was about a half a foot smaller than you were at first, but her eyes light up when she realizes that now you’re the exact same height.

She holds the recorder up to her face again and says “Test number one is a complete success. One drop of the formula has reduced the subject by a noticable margin. More tests to follow.” She presses stop and stands with her hands on her hips, glowing with pride at her accomplishment. “Finally, all of the hard work has paid off. We finally have a formula that works! How do you feel?” You respond that you can still feel a bit of a tingling sensation, but otherwise you’re fine. Freeman taps you on the head and says “Not to worry, that should go away in a few minutes. What you should probably worry about though is getting some clothes that fit. You look like a kid playing dressup in those clothes now!” You look down and see that she’s right. Your pants are a few inches too long, draping across the floor, your shirt hangs a bit over your belt which now needs to be tightened, and your shoes are loose enough for you to pop your feet in and out. Freeman seems to be enjoying watching you react to your newly oversized surroundings at first, but you see the smile start to fade from her face. She looks you up and down and says “... Uh oh. This is unexpected”. You don’t know what she’s talking about until she steps back right up beside you and you find yourself staring at her chin. She’s taller than she was before… which means you’re still shrinking. Freeman looks confused and says “I don’t understand. We followed the procedure exactly, the calculations were correct, the chance of this happening is minimal… but not impossible.” She holds her hand up to her chin in thought, and the tingling sensation begins to take hold again. You fear that something’s gone terribly wrong and it’s only confirmed when Freeman says “We had successful tests on mice before i gave you this experiment, but there was one outlier. One of the mice didn’t return to it’s normal size after a while, instead it just… continued to shrink. We never found it.”

Your face goes pale and you ask her if you’re going to disappear too and she says calmly at first but then getting more serious “No! Of course not! Maybe not… I don’t know…. Probably.” She switches gears to damage control mode and says “Normally the process wouldn’t need an antidote, it’s supposed to wear off on it’s own, but you’re shrinking a lot faster than i was expecting, so we may have to counteract the formula with another compound.” She opens her notes and uses her index finger to quickly scan through the pages of previous experiments. All you can do is stand there and try not to feel the world get smaller around you, but now that you know it’s happening, your mind is playing tricks with you and you can swear you’re feeling everything getting bigger. Freeman taps the page she had opened to and looks up at you quicky saying “Okay. Well.... According to the notes we took from the experiments on the mice, they had completely shrunk to nothingness within...
111.title: A Little Dab Will Do You

choices: "MEMORY" (She has you run a maze in the lab)
"DURABILITY" (She puts some pressure on you)
"STAMINA" (She puts you through a special cardio test)
113.content:
You hear Jenny narrating into the device as you drink most of the solution. It’s not too bad tasting, almost with a fruity tang to it as you feel it enter your stomach. You feel as though you should drink just a bit more, but the professor grabs your hand suddenly and says “That’s more than enough. The solution is very powerful. We’re not sure what would happen if you were to consume every last drop. Save the other half, we may need it for later.” You put the glass down and Freeman walks up to you and says “How do you feel? Any significant changes you can tell?” You start to say that you’re feeling a bit dizzy, when all of a sudden the room starts to expand around you. Freeman’s face goes from a look of concern to excited glee as you sink into your clothing. “It’s working! I knew it would work, of course, i triple checked the math on everything, but still! It’s so exciting to see this happen in person!” She rises further and further into the sky, your shirt forming a warm, clothy cavern around your ever dwindling form. When you finally stop shrinking, you manage to crawl out of the neck hole of your shirt and look up at the giant professor. She has crouched down slightly to get a better look at you, her arms slightly resting on her knees. She brings the recording device up to her face again and says, almost crying from happiness “THE SOLUTION IS A COMPLETE SUCCESS. SUBJECT HAS BEEN MINIATURIZED WITH SEEMINGLY NO ILL EFFECTS, AND ALL BODY PARTS APPEAR DIRECTLY PROPORTIONAL. INITIATING DIRECT CONTACT.”

You wonder what she means by direct contact, until a shadow is cast over you and she reaches down to grab you with one hand. Her massive fingers clasp around your body and grip you tightly in a fist with just your head peeking over the edge of her hand. You don’t dare struggle, knowing it would be all for naught. The room seems to whisk right by you as she quickly stands up, bringing you directly in front of her bespectacled eyes. Her grip on you is definitely solid, you won’t be able to maneuver yourself around much, but it’s far from painful. Just a solid amount of pressure surrounding your miniature body. The gigantic eyes in front of you dart back and forth over her fist, and although you’re too high up to actually see her smile, you can tell in the side of her face that she’s beaming from ear to ear. “THIS CONCLUDES TEST ONE. JENNIFER FREEMAN, PHD, SIGNING OFF.” She clicks the recorder off with her free hand and puts the recorder down. With her other hand free now, she decides to extend her index finger and rub your head gently, as one would a pet or a doll. “I COULDN’T SAY THIS ON THE RECORDING, BUT YOU CERTAINLY DO LOOK CUTE WHEN YOU’RE THIS SMALL.” As she compliments you (you guess), you can feel the fingers trapping you moving around slightly. You can tell she’s definitely enjoying the feeling of holding you in her hand, and the massive digits are molding you around slightly, trying to get a feel for every bit of you. It doesn’t bother you much, and you feel like you can trust her for the moment… Not like you have much of a choice.

You try to say thank you, but she just giggles at your attempt to communicate and says “SORRY, BUT YOUR VOICE IS AWFULLY SQUEAKY. I HAD A FEELING THAT WOULD BE A SIDE EFFECT OF THE PROCESS, I JUST DIDN’T EXPECT TO FIND IT SO FUNNY!” She continues to stare at you for what seems like an unreasonably long amount of time before you ask her what she plans to do next. Her eyes go wide with realization and she says “OH! RIGHT! YEAH, THERE ARE A FEW MORE THINGS I’D LIKE TO DO WITH YOU NOW THAT YOU’RE THIS SMALL. WE DON’T KNOW HOW LONG THE EXPERIENCE IS GOING TO LAST, SO WE NEED TO DO A FEW THINGS RIGHT AWAY.” She puts you down on the table and stands up to her full height, giving you a fantastic view of her proportionally gigantic body. The table is level with her large, curvy hips and they seem to sway as she stands there playing with her phone a bit. You’re finding yourself very attracted to this gargantuan redhead. She bends down over you, moving some of her long curls out of her face as she says “WE’RE GOING TO HAVE TO RUN A FEW TESTS ON YOU TO MAKE SURE THE PROCESS HASN’T NEGATIVELY AFFECTED YOU IN ANY WAY. AND I THINK THE BEST WAY TO DO THIS IS TO FOCUS ON YOUR…”
113.title: A Successful Formula

choices: "WHICH IS EXACTLY WHERE WE NEEDED HIM TO BE."
"WHICH IS NOT QUITE SMALL ENOUGH."
"... WHICH MEANS HE IS WAY TOO SMALL."
114.content:
You manage to drink down most of the contents of the bottle. The elixir is pleasant to taste, which makes it all the easier to choke down. You keep drinking until you see Freeman give you a thumbs up sign and you take that as your cue to stop. You look down at the bottle and notice that you've drank almost all of it, with just a small amount still remaining. You're also noticing tha tthe bottle is getting slightly heavier in your grasp. Damn, this stuff works fast! You quickly discard your clothes, afraid that you'll become lost in the fabric in a matter of minutes, and just as you get everything off in time, your height drops dramatically. The bottle that was once in your hand could now hold your body hundreds of times over, and you estimate that you've dropped below an inch tall. Everything in the room looks gigantic... including the gorgeous redhead standing in front of you.

Freeman had looked away for a split second, and that was just long enough for you to drop out of her sight. She bites her lip and grabs the recorder, and slowly crouches down. Her booming voice carries cross the room as she speaks into the recorder: "SUBJECT HAS TAKEN THE APPROPRIATE AMOUNT OF SOLUTION, AND MINIATURIZATION HAS BEGUN. CURRENTLY LOOKING FOR SUBJECT IN THE CARPET."
Her massive hand waves through the carpet fibers of the lab room, desperately looking for your miniscule body. You jump and wave up to her, but your little voice can't seem to travel up the full distance to her face. Her feet slam down with epic force as she takes small, calculated steps so as not to crush you by accident. You realize that if you want to be noticed by the giant woman, you're going to have to get closer. You run towards the scientist's massive open toed shoe, hoping beyond hope that she doesn't pivot suddenly and crush you under the heel. She moves with careful enough motions that you find yourself in front of her toes, and make your way over to the smallest one. Despite the fact that you are face to face with a woman's pinkie toe, it is still a massive orb of flesh that moves and wiggles on it's own terrifying fashion.

The heat coming off her humongous foot is somewhat overpowering while still inviting. The scent is somewhat pleasant, a mixture of strawberry scented lotion and leather, with just a hint of sweat mixed in. You are almost hypnotized by the feeling of being this close to a giant woman's body that you are snapped back to reality by her sudden act of moving her feet just a few inches. The giantess shuffles her body to one side, and you fall completely over on the space between the sandal edge and her toe. You are ridiculously tiny and you need to get her attention NOW. You muster up the courage to approach the toe directly and put your hands against the rugged, tough skin. You punch it a few times, hoping to get some sort of reaction out of the giantess, and your efforts seem to actually work. Freeman makes a quick laugh of realization and turns her attention back down to her feet, where she sees you waving up to her at her toe. She presses the recorder back up to her face and says "SUBJECT HAS BEEN LOCATED. HE IS CURRENTLY BESIDE MY LITTLE TOE, AT APPROXIMATELY HALF AN INCH TALL..."
114.title: At Freeman's Feet

choices: She grabs a glass of water... She's going to swallow you!
She removes her shoe... She's going to step on you!
She removes her pants... She's going to sit on you!
1141.content:
With a satisfied nod, Freeman looks down at the recorder and says "EXPERIMENT NUMBER ONE IS A RESOUNDING SUCCESS. FURTHER EXPERIMENTATION NEEDED OF COURSE, BUT FOR NOW WE ARE RIGHT ON TRACK." She hits stop on the recorder and moves her long red hair out of the way as she looks down at you. She's trying to appear as non-threatening as possible, but she's an absolute monolith of humanity, with her shadow casting down on what seems like miles of ground at your height. She smirks and points down at her toe, saying "GOOD JOB MEETING ME IN THE MIDDLE THERE. SORRY IF YOU FELT LIKE I WAS GONNA SQUASH YOU DOWN THERE. BUT YOU DON'T HAVE TO WORRY, I'M ALWAYS EXTRA CAREFUL WITH MY LITTLE SUBJECTS. WHAT DO YOU SAY WE GET YOU AWAY FROM MY TOES?" She lays her hand down flat on the edge of the sandal with her pinkie finger laid directly against the sandal material. You hop over the seemingly troublesome gap between the shoe and her hand and quickly run down the length of her finger to her waiting palm. Her hand smells like strawberries, which must be the scent of the lotion she uses on her soft skin. You can tell that she's trying to stifle a laugh as you scatter across the length of her pinkie, trying not to let your little feet tickle her skin. When you find yourself in the center of the tan, lined surface, the world seems to rise around you as the professor lifts her hand off the ground. She brings you up to about chest level and looks down at you with the world's largest smile. She holds her other hand up and brings her index finger up and down, giving you a tiny little wave. You respond in kind and she giggles, whispering "HEY CUTIE." You try and shout up to her to say something, but your little voice won't carry that far. At your height, the only way she'd be able to hear you is if you were actually in her ear pressed against her eardrum. She notices your efforts and smiles, saying "SORRY, LITTLE GUY. I WON'T BE ABLE TO HEAR YOU WHILE YOU'RE MINIATURIZED. EVEN IF I COULD, I'M SURE ALL I'D HEAR ARE SQUEAKS." You didn't REALLY need to feel smaller than you already were, but if any news were going to do it, that would be it.

Freeman uses a magnifying glass from the table to observe you a little bit closer, occasionally taking notes and humming to herself. Her voice is so deep and loud that even the simplest of hums vibrates through the air and shakes through your feet.
Standing on her palm is an odd but definitely not unpleasant experience, as the pleasurable scent from her lotion and the heat from her body almost rock you into a comfortable haze. Freeman looks down at you and without missing a beat asks "TAKING IN EVERYTHING? HOW DO MY HANDS SMELL? I HOPE THEY'RE CLEAN ENOUGH FOR YOU." You are a bit startled by this. Could she actually hear your thoughts or sense your feelings? Apparently not as she has an answer right away as she puts down the magnifying glass and plays with her hair a bit. "THE MOLECULAR COMPRESSION AFFECTS ALL YOUR SENSES AT ONCE. SIGHT, SMELL, HEARING. LIKE FOR EXAMPLE, IF IT WEREN'T FOR THE PROCESS, YOUR HEAD MAY HAVE ALREADY EXPLODED JUST FROM THE SOUND OF MY VOICE. LUCKILY, WE CAN SEE THAT'S NOT THE CASE." You take a big gulp and appreciate for a second how you're still able to understand the giantess. If what she's saying is true, the deep booming voice from the redheaded goliath could have been MUCH more painful if she wasn't looking ahead. Her free hand stops touching her long red locks and hovers over you for a quick second. "EVEN TOUCH IS AFFECTED. BUT YOU AREN'T MORE SENSITIVE TO IT. QUITE THE OPPOSITE." She brings the pinkie finger of her free hand over to you and presses down on you gently. It doesn't hurt, but you can definitely feel the pressure as she pushes down. She laughs at your struggling body beneath her fingertip and says "SEE? BECAUSE YOUR MOLECULES ARE PACKED SO TIGHTLY TOGETHER, I CAN'T SMUSH YOU LIKE A LITTLE FLEA. NOT THAT I'M CALLING YOU A FLEA AT ALL, BECAUSE YOU'RE NOT A BUG. YOU'RE STILL A PERSON. JUST MINIATURE." You appreciate that she's at least acknowledging your humanity as you stand there motionless in the center of her palm. It's good to know that you're not exactly a bug, even if your stature certainly makes you sympathize with one. She lifts her finger off and taps her finger against the palm in front of you and says "HOWEVER, WE NEED TO DO A FEW PRESSURE TESTS JUST IN CASE THE PROCEDURE DIDN'T WORK COMPLETELY. SO WE'LL HAVE TO PUT A BIT MORE WEIGHT ON YOUR TINY LITTLE SHOULDERS." She gives you a wink as she slowly tilts her palm over the edge of the lab table, allowing you to slide off of her skin and onto the cold, hard metal of the table's surface. She grabs the recorder and begins another entry: "PROFESSOR JENNIFER FREEMAN. SUBJECT IS SHOWING NO ILL EFFECTS OF THE MINIATURIZATION PROCESS. EXPERIMENT NUMBER 2 IS ABOUT TO BEGIN, AND WILL TEST THE SUBJECT'S ABILITY TO WITHSTAND MASSIVE AMOUNTS OF PRESSURE." You take a deep breath and prepare to face the worst as the professor prepares your next test:
1141.title: Half Inch Experimentation

choices: "GET ANOTHER TEST SUBJECT" She says reaching for her phone
"TRY SOMETHING A LITTLE... UNORTHODOX" She says reaching for the formula
"TRY AGAIN TOMORROW" She says, putting you in a glass box!
1142.content:
Standing next to her littlest toe which absolutely dwarves you in size, you can’t believe you’re hearing her say that you’re still too tall. She sighs and speaks into the recorder again saying "EXPERIMENT HALTED TEMPORARILY UNTIL SUBJECT IS AT THE PROPER SIZE. MORE TO FOLLOW SOON." She presses stop and looks down at you saying "ALRIGHT. LET'S GET YOU OFF THE GROUND, SHORTY." In a swift motion, the giant scientist reaches down wth a thumb and forefinger, carefully grabbing you by the waist between her fingertips. You pray that she has the self control not to bring her digits together even the slightest bit, fearing that she is just millimeters away from squashing you flat. She carries you across the room and safely lowers you down to the lab table, next to equipment so oversized you have a hard time seeing exactly what anything is until she picks it up and puts it into view for you. As she writes down some notes on a small yellow pad, you are astounded by how much your senses pick up at this height. The scribbling on the notepad, the smell of Freeman’s perfume, even the body heat coming off of her hips as she pivots in place. Every sensation is amplified to an almost unrecognizable degree. You call up to her, looking for a little bit of attention, but it is in vain. Your little voice probably can’t even reach higher than the midriff of her shirtt, even if you were to yell at full volume. She eventually looks down at you and giggles, the booming laughter shaking you a bit, even knowing that she’s just doing it slightly under her breath. “YOU ARE PRETTY ADORABLE THERE ON MY TABLE. LIKE A LITTLE BUG SCAMPERING ABOUT. IT’S A SHAME YOU’RE ONLY…” Quicker than you can react, she moves her hand swiftly behind you, holding a large wooden pillar. It slams into the table behind you and you instinctively stand perfectly still as she narrows her gaze and fixes her glasses. She bites her lip and says “YUP. JUST AS I EXPECTED. ONLY A HALF AN INCH. YOU SHOULD BE JUST A LITTLE BIT MORE MINISCULE CONSIDERING HOW MUCH OF THE FORMULA YOU DRANK.”

With her head still lowered, you call up to her asking why you’re not small enough. She shakes her head slightly, standing back up to her full height but not breaking eye contact with you. “SORRY LITTLE MAN. YOUR VOICE IS WAY TOO SQUEAKY FOR ME TO UNDERSTAND YOU. BUT I THINK I KNOW WHAT YOU’RE SAYING. HOW COULD THIS POSSIBLY NOT BE SMALL ENOUGH. RIGHT?” You shake your head up and down, throwing your arms up as if to say “No Shit”. She sees this and laughs a little before you. “DON’T GET ME WRONG. I’M REALLY EXCITED THAT YOU’RE SO SMALL RIGHT NOW. IT’S JUST… I’M A BIT OF A PERFECTIONIST, AND THIS SOLUTION HAS TO HAVE AN EXACT PROPORTION RATE. BASED ON THE AMOUNT YOU DRANK, YOU SHOULD BE JUST A LITTLE BIT SMALLER.” She can’t hear you so you don’t bother asking exactly how small you are supposed to be, but luckily she anticipated your actions and answers to herself “AN EIGHTH OF AN INCH TALL. SO ABOUT A QUARTER OF THE SIZE YOU’RE AT NOW. AS HARD AS THAT IS TO BELIEVE.”

You are a little blown away by just how much smaller she was anticipating you’d be, and don’t know if you could handle being THAT small. Even now talking to her directly is impossible, and every small move she makes terrifies you with how easily she could unknowingly crush you. She crouches down next to the table so that her huge eyes are level with you, seperated by the thick glass of her spectacles. The table vibrates slightly as she speaks, making you feel even lower to the ground than you already are. “THE EXPERIMENT CAN’T CONTINUE UNTIL THE SUBJECTS ARE THE APPROPRIATE SIZE FOR ALL THE TESTS. SOOOO THERE’S ONLY ONE THING WE CAN DO NOW…”
1142.title: And you thought THIS was small enough!

choices: "DISPOSE OF YOU."
"PUT YOU WITH THE REST OF THE REJECTS."
"PERFORM A DIFFERENT EXPERIMENT."
1143.content:
Your jaw drops as Freeman’s smile disappears and she says “SUBJECT WILL BE TAKEN CARE OF. HUMAN TESTING WILL PROCEDE FROM THE INTRODUCTORY STATE AT NEXT CONVENIENT OPPORTUNITY.” She presses stop on the recorder and sighs wistfully. “OH WELL. WE TRIED. SORRY LITTLE GUY.” She reaches into her pocket and pulls out a pair of small metal tweezers. You see her reach down for you and attempt to escape her grasp, but her huge body moves just too quickly for you to gain any ground. She snags you up between the oversized metal tongs and whisks you up to her face, holding a palm beneath you to cradle your fall if she was to drop you. From your perspective you can only see one of Freeman’s eyes, focusing on you intently through the thick lens of her glasses. Although you can’t see the rest of her face, you can tell she is significantly more upset than when you started. “I’M SO SORRY, BUT THE EXPERIMENT WAS NEVER MEANT TO PROGRESS THIS FAR. YOU’VE BECOME TOO LITTLE FOR US TO REVERSE THE PROCESS. YOU’RE GOING TO BE THIS SMALL FOREVER.”

Your whole world collapses as you hear the news. You’re going to never be able to get back to your normal size? You can barely contemplate what the rest of your life is going to be like, trapped forever in a body the size of an ant. You don’t really have a lot of time to think about it though, as Freeman brings her hand up underneath you, this time holding a thin glass tube. She releases the grip of the tweezers, and you fall down into the container between her fingers. Luckily, due to your compression, you don’t break your legs upon reaching the bottom, but you do feel the pressure on your knees and fall over. As soon as you gain your bearings, you look through the glass and pound your little fists against the glass, in an attempt so fruitless, it doesn’t even make a sound that she can hear. She lifts the container up to her eye again, this time looking even more distorted due to the glass container you’re trapped in. Her voice echos through the tube as she whispers “I’M SORRY, BUT THERE’S ONLY ONE THING WE CAN DO NOW....
1143.title: Too Small For This To Work

choices: She removes her shirt!  (You shrink from arousal)
She slaps you! (You shrink from pain)
She tells you to shrink!  (You shrink from auditory commands)
115.content: You ask her if she's serious and she goes "Yup. The whole thing. Bottoms up!" You shrug and take a sip, enjoying the taste of the formula. It's sweet and fruity, without being too strong to resist. It goes down pretty easy, and before you realize it, it's all gone. She grabs the glass from you and says "Thanks! Now we can move on." You stand in place, waiting for your body to start shrinking, but it doesn't seem to be happening. She laughs at your confusion and says "I know, i know. You were probably expecting to get little right away. But that's not how the formula works. It's more of a reactant than a direct compound. Meaning it needs an external stimuli in order for you to be miniaturized." You kind of get the jist of what she's saying: Your body will shrink when something particular happens. She gets up close to you and says "Alright. Are you to see what's going to cause you to shrink?" You nod up and down and Freeman smiles and says "Very well. Test number one begins now..."
115.title: What Causes You To Shrink?

choices: She only hits it for a few seconds - You're a foot smaller!
She holds on a little bit - You're six inches tall!
She holds on too long - You're a half an inch tall!
She misses you and hits a mirror... It strikes her instead!
She misses you and hits a mirror... It strikes someone walking in!
12.content:
You were kind of hoping for someone a little older to be handling the experiments, so there was a bit of unease when the door opened and in walked Mai. She was a younger Asian girl, couldn't have been more than 21 and was wearing blue jeans with a tight fitting white t-shirt. She shoots you a smile as she walks in towards you, and shakes your hand very excitedly. "Hi there! I'm Mai, i'll be working with you today! Thank you sooo much for doing this for me!" You ask her exactly what qualifications she has and she says "Well... I'm a student at the university down the street. I've been studying biology and bio-mass for the past few years, and if this proves successful, illl be able to get my masters in NOTIME." She gets right to work, pulling out a large book of randomly scattered notes and calculations, along with a silver toolbox. "So tell me about yourself. Where are you from? What do you do? Are you allergic to penacilin?" She fires question after question at you and you do your best to answer as she hurriedly takes down your measurements. You stand there amazed as she asks question after question, checking your blood pressure, height, and even tentative grip strength relatively in a flash. She takes a breath for a moment and looks up at you, shooting an awkward smile and says "Sorry. I know i'm breezing through the introductions. I just don't know how much time they're giving us to work on this and I really want to get some experimenting done before we have to give up the room."

You ask her what exactly she plans to do with you and she says "Oh! Right! I never told you. I'm gonna make you smaller." You do a double take and ask her exactly what she means by that and she says "Okay, so... you know how we're all made up of atoms and compounds? I found a way to compress those compounds in a way that proportionally effects a person's size... hypothetically. We haven't been able to secure the rights to human testing yet, but that changes with you!" You ask if she knows what she's doing and she rolls her eyes "Totally. I know exactly what i'm doing. Well kind of. I haven't tested it out on anything living yet. But i shrank a couple of chairs and tables and stuff, and they seemed fine!" She opens the toolbox and pulls out what looks like a small super soaker toy with a glowing red nozzle. She flips a switch and the whole thing lights up. You start to get a bit nervous, especially as she tells you to stand up against a wall. She places a piece of black electrical tape on the wall right above your head and walks backwards. "Keep yourself lined up with the tape on the wall there. I want to see just how much height you can lose from one shot."

You take a deep breath and close your eyes almost like you're facing a firing squad... and in a way you sort of are. Mai writes down one final note and lifts the gun up, finger on the trigger and closes one eye to aim properly. "Alright, get ready to be small... this is gonna be so great!" She pulls the trigger and you brace for impact...
12.title: Mai and her Shrink Ray

choices: She shoots you with the gun, and returns you to normal
She shoots you with the gun, but something goes wrong
Someone entered the room before she could return you to normal
121.content:
In a bright green flash, almost instantaneous, you watch your worldview change. You feel as if you've stepped into a small pit of some sort, and you're sinking into the floor. But you know that's not the case, the girl on the other end of the room just made you smaller. At first glance it doesn't look like that significant of a difference in height, until Mai takes a few steps directly towards you. She's knocked a solid foot or so off of your height, and even though you were a good half a foot taller than this girl when you started, you find yourself looking just below her nose when you look straight ahead. She's now a lot taller than you, and she's the one who has to look down to look in your eyes. A fact that is not lost on her, as she holds up a palm, flat down on your head, matches it up with herself and lets out a quick laugh before covering her mouth.
You give her a look as if to say "really?" And she collects herself, saying "I'm sorry. I'm sorry. It's just that i'm not used to seeing guys who are shorter than me. Well... Smaller is the right term. Everything about you looks like it should be proportionally shrunk to match your height. I just need to make sure to document everything. Because i don't want to jinx it, but... I think it worked compeltely!" She excitedly rushes over to her bag and pulls out a notebook, matching up your current height against the wall with the height you recorded at earlier. You can hear her talk out loud as she says "Starting height was Five foot 10... current height... Four foot ten! Exactly one foot!" That foot makes all the difference in your perspective, and you're still looking around the room, trying to make sense of the random changes in the height and depth of everything around you. Even though you haven't changed much, the small change is more than a little disorienting.

Mai leans in uncomfortably close to you , sizing you up bit by bit and writing down notes in her ratty pink notebook. She'll occasionally pinch and prod your skin, which you really wish she'd stop doing. WHen she tries to lift up your shirt, you go to grab her arm, but can't move it as easily as you'd thought. Mai looks down at you and lets out a small laugh of surprise, before asking "Were you... just trying to move my arm just there?" She breaks her arm free and stands with her hands on her hips, regarding you with a much more confident smile than before. "Your strength definitely diminished with your height. You can't overpower me anymore, can you?" You start to get a little nervous, hoping she doesn't let the sudden influx of power go to her head. Luckily, she doesn't do anything malicious, just pats you condescendingly on the head and says "As fun as it is being the big strong one here, I'll just wrap this up and grow you back to normal size." You're kind of surprised with how quickly the test went... at most you've only been there for fifteen minutes. You ask if you're really done with everything and she shrugs and goes "Yeah. That's all we had scheduled for today." Today? As in you'll need to come back? You ask her about this and she nods excitedly and says "Yup! We've got you booked for at least two weeks. And each day we're going to make you a different size. We need to run all the tests in a measured, careful manner. I really don't want to screw this up." You ask kind of nervously just how much smaller you're going to end up by the end of this, and without a shred of care or sympathy, Mai smiles excitedly and holds her thumb and forefinger with a small space apart, almost touching the tips with how close she brings them together. "Reeeeeeal small. Like I probably won't be able to see you with my regular glasses by the time we're done testing. Maybe you'll fit under a microscope or something. But that's a ways away." You take a hard gulp and she catches your obvious dread at being microscopic and under the hyperactive girl's care. She puts a hand on your shoulder and says "Don't worry, it's totally safe. I mean... obviously you being small will come with some crazy dangers and stuff, but i'm gonna take real good care of you!" It may be the cute look in her eyes, the beaming smile, or just the overall demeaner she gives you, but even though you're worried about what's to come, you do actually trust Mai. She puts her notebook down and reaches back for the gun and says "Alright. let's get you back to normal."
121.title: Now You're Shorter Than Mai

choices: You
Mai
April
1213.content:
Before anything else can happen, there's a knock at the door. "Yo, May-may. Let me in, I'm here." Mai looks at the door and rolls her eyes saying "Oh great. April's here." You ask who that is and she says "She's my partner for this experiment. At least she was supposed to be. We got grouped together based on our last names. She hasn't done a thing to make this happen." April swings open the door and you are more than a little intimidated by her height. She's a good eight or nine inches taller than may, which means by now she's almost a foot taller than you.
She's got a classic punk look to her, with a leather jacket, white tshirt underneath, and loose dark blue jeans. it's hard to tell how long they travel down because her leather boots are all the way up to her knees. She regards the two of you with a nod and says "Hey shrimp. And hey... other shrimp. God, you short people sure like to hang out together, don't you?" Mai is obviously used to the abuse and says "For your information April... This is our test subject. He's been very helpful so far, and we've even finished the first test." April looks over at you and says "For real? Like you used to be.... taller?" You nod your head and she laughs, saying "Good job, Mai Mai. I knew teaming up with you was basically a guaranteed A."

While Mai tries her best to ignore the brash young lady, April looks you up and down and says “So this is it, huh? You know when you said you were gonna shrink a guy i thought he'd be a lot smaller than this” Mai sighs angrily and says “This was the first experiment. You would have known that if you actually read the outline i sent you.” April looks at you and pokes you in the shoulder, saying “You’re lucky i wasn’t doing this test, shorty. I would have said screw the slow and steady method. I would have made you bug-sized right away. In fact…” She reaches quickly down at the table and grabs the gun at an awkward angle, pointing it at your neck “Why don’t we do that right now? I’d REALLY like to see a dude shrunk down and scamper around on the floor like a rat!” Mai tenses up and says “April! The device turned on when you grabbed it like that! Just put it down gently and we can talk about this.” April rolls her eyes and says “I’m just playing around with him. God, you’re such a buzzkill.” April does NOT put it down gently and instead drops it onto the table, with the muzzle facing out at all three of you. A bright beam shoots out across the room and it strikes...
1213.title: Interrupted by April

choices: The beam hits Mai, Shrinking her down to your size
The beam misses Mai, hitting something else in the room
The beam hits Mai, Shrinking her down and YOU WITH HER
12131.content:
The light impacts your body square in the chest, and you immediately feel the effects, your whole body shrinking down in size (with your clothing along with it). Within a matter of seconds, you are no longer the size of a human, instead finding yourself closer to that of a find yourself in a much different world, staring at April’s thigh high boots. You direct your gaze upwards and see the giant punk staring down at you with wide open eyes. She lets out a small laugh of surprise and crouches down, casting a menacing shadow over your significantly smaller body. She reaches out for you and plucks you between two fingers, licking her lips as she says “NOW WE’RE TALKING.” She lifts you off the ground, dangling you in front of her face. She giggles at your helplessness and jabs you with the pointer finger of her free hand. Your body swings with motion and pain as she pokes and prods you with her index finger, which you can tell is about twice as long as you are tall. “COOL. YOU WERE A PERSON LIKE A MINUTE AGO. NOW YOU’RE A TOY. AND YOU CAN DO THIS TO ANYONE, MAY-MAY?”

In a flash you are surrounded by a different set of fingers as Mai quickly grabs you out of April’s teasing grasp.
“STOP TOUCHING HIM LIKE THAT, YOU BIG LUMOX! HE’S INCREDIBLY VULNERABLE LIKE THAT!” April laughs and says “YEAH, THAT’S WHAT MAKES IT SO FUNNY. I WAS JUST ABOUT TO SEE IF HE’D SPLATTER ON THE GROUND IF I DROPPED HIM FROM A HEIGHT OF LIKE TWO FEET. SO PATHETIC.” Safely nestled in Mai’s palm, you hear her shout out at April in anger “YOU CRAZY BITCH! THIS IS WHY I DIDN’T WANT YOU TO BE INVOLVED IN THIS PROJECT. YOU’RE COMPLETELY INSANE.” Mai looks down at you in her hand and curls her palm to shield you from the dangers of the outside world. You feel unbelievably safe as she peers down at you and whispers “I’VE GOT YOU NOW. DON’T WORRY. SHE WON’T HURT YOU WHILE I’M AROUND” You don’t relax for too long however, as you hear a booming voice beyond the warm embrace of Mai say very sternly “WHAT DID YOU JUST SAY TO ME, SHORTY?”

You see Mai’s face raise up to face April, and then go cold with her huge mouth agape. You look backwards over the hills of Mai’s fingers and see in the distance the giant form of April, standing defiantly with the gun pointed directly at you and Mai. Mai’s palm shakes with the rest of her body in fear as you struggle to stand up in the giant girl’s palm. April smirks and says with a nasty cackle “YOU WANT TO LOOK AFTER THE BUG? FINE. IT WOULD PROBABLY BE EASIER IF YOU WERE CLOSER TO HIS SIZE TO DO IT.” Without another word, April fires the ray again, and you brace for impact.
12131.title: April Shrinks You

choices: Deeper (She's growing!)
Higher (She's shrinking!)
12133.content: April jumps back as a flash engulfs the room. The bright beam flies out of the gun and strikes the punk directly in the chest. She runs her hands over her front, apparently unharmed. "Uh oh... April got zapped. Not good," Mai says. April grabs her head and says "Mai, what the hell happened... I feel... funny." You and Mai both caught it as she said it. Her voice was changing, and therefore her size was too. When she said that her voice seemed much...
12133.title: April Gets Shot

choices: Follow Mai and give her back the gun
Test out the gun some more in the lab!
Take the gun someplace new.  Have some fun with it!
121332.content:
“Hey! Help me! Help meeeee!” April’s voice gets higher and higher as she shrinks into her clothes. You and Mai stand there in awe as she disappears into the fabric, which flops against the ground in a matter of seconds. You are the first to approach the clothing, carefully going through April’s shirt, jacket and pants, finding nothing. You look back at Mai and shrug, but Mai slowly approaches and says “I uh.. I think i might know where she is.” You can tell that mai is trying to hold back laughter as she goes right up next to you and grabs April’s large black leather boot. She looks into the opening and her eyes go wide with surprise and delight. “Oh… My… God… I found her.” You look into the opening of the boot, and there on the thick black sole inside the shoe is a tiny woman, no more than two inches tall, jumping around angrilly and banging her feet against the thick leather interior. She looks up at the two of you, and to your shock is not surprised or frightened by what she sees, but filled with murderous rage. “You giant fucking idiot! Look what you did to me! Change me back right now you bitch!” Mai can’t hold it back any more and lets out a large snorting laugh at the miniscule woman trapped in her own shoe.

“Oh my god, April. You are soooo cute in there! Walking around inside your shoe all itty bitty like that!” April is having none of this and screams up at her “Get me out of here right now! It stinks so bad in here!” Mai raises an eyebrow and says “Who’s fault is that? It’s YOUR shoe. Can’t handle your own foot funk, Ape?” April gets frustrated and starts to climb up the side of her shoe, screaming up at Mai the whole time. “When i get out of here… I’m gonna kick your ass… you stupid chink bitch!” Mai leans her face right into the opening, blocking out most of the light, and frightening April a little more. She’s finally starting to understand her situation as Mai speaks very softly at her “I’m getting a little tired of hearing you call me a bitch.” She reaches a hand in and gently pokes April, causing her to lose her grip and fall back onto her own smelly sole. Mai scans the bottom of the shoe and sees the number that April is sitting on top of and says “Hey, that’s funny… I never knew we were the same size. Mind if i try it on?” April squeaks in horror “You… You wouldn’t!” And Mai looks at you, whispering with no small amount of excitement “Actually, I would.”

She places the boot on the ground, removing her own shoe at the same time. Her bare foot which was contained in a thin black sandal wiggles it’s toes with anticipation and slowly makes it’s way into the boot’s opening. You can hear the faint high pitched squeal of terror coming from the boot as April desperately tries to make her way to the toe section, avoiding Mai’s giant foot. Mai giggles as she starts to step down, indicating that she’s found the little girl and has her pressed snuggly underneath her toes. She sits down to put the other boot on, and looks up at you saying “Don’t worry, she should be safe in there. The gun compacts molecules down so tightly she’ll never be squished. But she may feel a little bit of pressure… and there’s not much i can do about the smell.” You stand there speechless as Mai stands up and grabs the ray gun. Looking it over, she wordlessly points it at you, zapping you back to your normal size. She puts the gun away, giving you aminute or so to readjust to your newly restored surroundings. She picks up a clipboard and holds a pen out to you saying “I think that’s all i’ll need from you for this experiment. Sign here please?” You sign the paper and in a moment of disbelief ask if that’s really it. She nods quickly and says “Yup. I was originally going to make you much smaller, but it turns out I have a new test subject. And i think i'll get a lot more out of the experiment if she's the one that feels insignificant. Thanks for all your help though!” She stands up on her tip toes and gives you a kiss on the cheek, shining one more smile before walking out the door.

You hold your cheek reflecting on the moment, trying to figure out exactly what the fuck just happened. You look around the room one more time and notice something a bit surprising… Mai left the room without the shrink ray! It’s locked up in the packaging, but she must have been so excited about the shrunken girl at her feet that she had completely forgot about the gun! So it looks like you have a choice to make on how you’re going to spend the rest of the day….
121332.title: Trapped In Her Own Shoe

choices: "WE HAVE SOME MORE TESTS TO RUN" She says before reaching to grab you
"I DON'T REALLY KNOW HOW" She says as she stands back up
"YOU'RE JUST TOO CUTE LIKE TO CHANGE BACK!" She says as she leans in for a kiss!
122.content:
You watch in awe as Mai transforms rather quickly from a meek young girl to a towering giantess in a matter of seconds. She manages to time the trigger just right so when she lets go of it, you are left a mere six inches tall. And you know this for a fact because of the tape measure glued to the wall behind you. You aren't at exactly the six inch mark. You use the markings to determine that you level out at 5.85 inches. You were around Five-foot 10 when you started the experiment, so it makes sense that the ray shrunk you to a size 12 times smaller than your normal height. And this doesn't really sink in until you turn around and see Mai's gigantic face peering directly at you.

She's laying flat on her stomach, using one arm to hold her chest up. Her smile seems yards wide as she wordlessly fawns over your much smaller body. You almost flinch for a second as she brings a hand close to you, extending her thumb and forefinger outwards to match your height. She looks at you, and looks at the fingers for scale, laughing in a much deeper and louder voice than you're used to hearing come from her petit body. She whispers in delight "SOOO TINY!!" She rests her chin on her hands face down, and continues to marvel at your little body. "YOU ARE JUST THE MOST AMAZING THING. HOW DO I LOOK FROM DOWN THERE? I MUST LOOK SO HUGE. YOU'RE LIKE... THE SIZE OF MY PINKIE. I JUST WANT TO KEEP LOOKING AT YOU FOREVER."

She reaches into her pocket and pulls out a magnifying glass, further treating you like an inanimate object for her study, as she tries to look at every inch of your shrunken form. She smiles proudly and says "EVERYTHING LOOKS GREAT. I MEAN YOU LOOK... YOU LOOK LIKE YOU ALWAYS DID, JUST TINY. EVERYTHING'S PROPORTIONAL, YOU DON'T SEEM TO BE IN PAIN... I'D CALL THIS A SUCCESS!" You can see her resisting the urge to poke you like a pet or a toy, and hope she doesn't take too much advantage of the obvious size difference between the two of you. You ask her if you can change back now that you've successfully finished the test. She doesn't hear you correctly and leans her huge head towards you, holding a hand up to her ear. "YOU'RE GONNA HAVE TO SPEAK LOUDER. EVERYTHING'S A LOT SMALLER ABOUT YOU NOW, INCLUDING YOUR ITTY BITTY VOICE!" You shout up into the extended ear and repeat your question. Mai shakes her head and says "NO CAN DO, LITTLE GUY." You ask why and she says "WELL, IT'S BECAUSE..."
122.title: Zapped to Six Inches Tall

choices: You'll go home with Mai.  She seems nice.
You'll stay here in the lab.  Just to be safe.
1222.content:
You are stunned by her answer… but more so by the fact that she doesn’t seem too bothered by it. She uses her arms to prop her body back up and in one fluid motion, the giant girl rises, stomping away to the other end of the room to quickly look at her phone. You run after her, taking a full two minutes or so to reach the spot it took her three or four large steps to reach. You approach her feet and hit the exposed toe through her shoe, and she looks down and gasps in surprise. She holds a hand to her chest and collects herself before crouching down to get a better look at you. “DON’T SCARE ME LIKE THAT, MAN! IF I HAD MOVED MY FOOT JUST A LITTLE BIT I COULD HAVE CRUSHED YOU. WHAT’S THE MATTER?” She leans out a hand and lays it down palm up, allowing you to climb into it. Her skin sinks slightly as you take steps over her fingers and into the center, kneeling down so you wouldn’t be tossed around as she lifts you up to her face.

She smiles and her eyes look at you lovingly, as she takes her free hand and uses two fingers to lightly pet you, like one would a doll or a pet. She tilts her head and says “YOU ARE SO CUTE LIKE THIS. I’VE GOT HALF A MIND TO TAKE YOU HOME AND PUT YOU WITH THE REST OF MY LITTLE THINGS.” You start to get a little frustrated, and shake off her massive fingers, looking up at her. You shout up at her that you want to be normal again, and Mai just lowers her glasses and looks at you sternly. “I TOLD YOU, LITTLE GUY. I DON'T KNOW HOW TO MAKE PEOPLE BIGGER. MY DEVICE WAS ONLY CALIBRATED TO MAKE THINGS SMALLER. BESIDES, MY BOSSES TOLD ME STRAIGHT UP THAT I WASN'T ALLOWED TO TRY AND REVERSE ANYTHING I SHRUNK. JUST GET YOU READY FOR THE NEXT PART OF THE EXPERIMENT." You ask who she would need to get permission from and she motions over to the door, saying “MY PROFESSOR, MISS FREEMAN. SHE’S BEEN STUDYING SIZE MANIPULATION FOR THE PAST FEW YEARS, I’M THE FIRST PERSON SHE’S TRUSTED WITH HER SHARE OF THE WORK.” You sit back in her palm and think about things for a few moments. If there’s someone else running the experiment, it may be possible for you to get back to normal. You just won’t be able to do it through Mai here. The giant girl obviously cares about you, and fawns over your little body. It’s obvious she wouldn’t do anything to hurt you or trap you at this size on purpose. But you can't help but be frustrated that she shrunk you without the power (or permission in this case) to try and bring you back up to normal.

She sees in your eyes that you are a bit worried, and an idea sparks across her mind. She brings you up to her eyes and says “I’VE GOT AN IDEA. I’M SUPPOSED TO LEAVE YOU IN THE LAB UNTIL TOMORROW… BUT WOULD YOU LIKE TO COME HOME WITH ME?” You are a bit taken back by her offer and she immediately tries to justify it. “YOU WON’T BE THERE FOR LONGER THAN ONE NIGHT. I JUST FIGURE YOU MAY AS WELL BE COMFORTABLE BEFORE THE EXPERIMENT CONTINUES. I CAN SET YOU UP IN ONE OF MY DOLLHOUSES, IT’LL BE LIKE A HOTEL RESORT. WHAT DO YOU SAY?” You think about it for a moment and conclude....
1222.title: Stuck at this size?

choices: You stay in the bag, waiting for Mai to take you
You say "Screw this" and climb out of the bag
1223.content:
You don't really have time to respond as the giant girl leans in so quickly and swiftly that it catches you by surprise. Her eyes are close and her lips are pouted, and all you can do is hold an arm up to stop her, but her huge hand sweeps in behind you and pulls you in close. She presses you firmly but not painfully into her waiting lips, enveloping you in a gigantic, wet kiss. You feel two of her fingers hold you in place by your back as she lifts herself off the ground, and you are being carried up for the ride. When she stands to her full height, she seperates her lips and you fall backwards into her waiting hand, which has been repositioned so you land directly in the center of her palm. She has her fingers together lifted towards the sky, holding your miniscule frame to face her, almost like a massive chair made of warm, sweet scented skin. Mai giggles at the sight of you in her palm and holds a finger out with her free hand circling around you in a taunting manner. "YOU'RE SOOO CUTE AND PRECIOUS LIKE THAT. JUST LIKE ALL MY MINIATURES AT HOME. ONLY LIVING AND MOVING. JUST LIKE I ALWAYS PICTURED IT WOULD BE LIKE WHEN I FINALLY FIGURED OUT HOW TO SHRINK PEOPLE." She walks over to the table and starts putting her things away with you resting in her hand, too afraid to move. Even if you shift from side to side there is the threat that you could fall out of her grasp and have a harsh landing on the tiled floor below. So you just nestle in for the ride as the asian behemoth cradles you as she works. "I'VE ALWAYS LOVED LITTLE THINGS. DOLLS, TOY CARS, MODELS, THAT SORT OF THING. I'VE GOT A HUGE COLLECTION OF STUFF AT HOME, JUST WAITING TO BE PLAYED WITH." She holds you up to her face and licks her lips, saying with a pleased, somewhat menacing tone "AND NOW THAT I KNOW THAT I CAN MAKE ANYTHING I WANT SMALLER, I THINK MY COLLECTION'S GOING TO BE GETTING A LOT BIGGER."

With a quick shudder of excitement, Mai lowers her palm into her bag, tilting it so you land carefully on the ground. There is a fair amount of light bleeding through the opening, so you can see you're surrounded by Mai's makeup kit, wallet, and phone. She waves a finger in your face and says "NOW DON'T GO ANYWHERE. I'VE STILL GOT TO FILL OUT THE PAPERWORK FOR THE LAB. BUT AS SOON AS I'M DONE I'LL TAKE YOU HOME. TRUST ME, NOTHING BAD'S GOING TO HAPPEN TO YOU WHILE YOU'RE SUPER TINY. I'LL TAKE SUPER GOOD CARE OF YOU." She stomps out the door and you hear the door close behind her, leaving you alone in the confines of her bag. You pace around for a minute wondering what to do. If you stack up some of the items in her bag, there's a chance you could be able to escape from the hyperactive girl. There's no telling what awaits you when you're only a few inches high, but you're not sure if you want to end up the pretty young lady's plaything. On the other hand, she may be the only person who can restore you to normal size. Even if you have to put up with a fair amount of humiliation and all the hassles that come with being Mai's shrunken man... She's the only one you know of who's ever changed a person's size. Is it worth the risk?
1223.title: Mai Wants To Keep You

choices: You stay on the desk for her to return
You climb down the desk to escape
12231.content:
You decide it would be best to stay with this girl and follow through with the rest of her plans. You already agreed to do the experiment for an extended period of time, so naturally it makes sense for her to bring you home, right? You decide to stay where at least you know you won't have to worry about being trampled underfoot and wait in the girl's bag. After a while, the door opens again, and Mai comes in, peering into the bag to affirm that you haven't left and smiles upon seeing you. "GOOD JOB, YOU DIDN'T TRY TO ESCAPE! I KNOW YOU MAY FEEL A LITTLE COOPED UP IN THERE, BUT MY HOUSE IS JUST A FEW BLOCKS AWAY, SO YOU WON'T BE IN THERE FOR MUCH LONGER. BESIDES, WE HAVE A LOT MORE FUN TO HAVE BEFORE THE EXPERIMENT ENDS. SO HOLD ON TIGHT AND WE'LL BE OUT OF HERE BEFORE YOU KNOW IT!" You start to sigh a breath of relief, hearing her reafirm that she's only going to be keeping you small for the duration of the experiment. But that relieif is temporarily jolted when Mai closes up her bag, leaving you in darkness. With every sway of her hips and movement of the world outside, you are shaken from one side of the bag to the other. You learn from your mistake and sit down next to her change purse, holding onto the zipper to keep yourself steady for the ride back to her home.

After what seems like an eternity, she gently lifts you out of the bag and nuzzles you up against her cheek. She’s enjoying this a lot more than you are, though you do admit that you’re starting to enjoy the care and affection she’s showing you just a little bit. She smiles widely in your face and says “I DON’T THINK I’LL EVER GET USED TO THE FEELING OF HOLDING YOUR WITTLE BODY IN MY HANDS. I FEEL SO GIGANTIC WHEN I DO.” She holds her hand out in front of her and points behind you, and says “LOOK. THERE’S THE REST OF MY LITTLE THINGS. YOU’D FIT RIGHT IN.” You turn around and you’re faced with a massive glass cabinet, roughly There is a huge collection of miniatures behind glass cases. You see an empty case on the wall and you nervously point to it, asking if that’s for you. She laughs and says “NO, NO. THAT’S FOR A VERY SPECIAL LITTLE TOY I’VE HAD MY EYES ON FOR YEARS. I HAD SOMETHING ELSE IN MIND FOR YOU.” She leans in close and says “BUT REMEMBER THAT EVEN THOUGH YOU’RE MY GUEST, YOU’RE STILL MY TEST SUBJECT. SO REMEMBER TO DO AS I SAY, OR MAYBE I’LL PUT YOU IN THERE TEMPORARILY AS A PUNISHMENT. SO YOU’D BETTER BEHAVE, MISTER.”

She lowers her hand down to her desk, and you find yourself atop a stack of papers as Mai stands up tall and puts a hand to her chin. “I SHOULD PROBABLY FIND SOMETHING TO KEEP YOU IN. I KNOW I HAVE A BUNCH OF SPARE CASES FOR MY COLLECTION AND CAGES FOR SOME OLD PETS… BUT I THINK YOU DESERVE SOMETHING A LITTLE MORE HOMELY. I’M GONNA SEE IF MY SISTER STILL HAS HER OLD DOLLHOUSE. DON’T WANDER TOO FAR, LITTLE GUY. DON’T WANT YOU FALLING OFF THE DESK!” She turns and skps out of the room, each thunderous step slamming hard against the ground as she leaves. You look down at the paper you’re standing on and see a blown-up picture of you with all your information next to it. Birthday, blood type, height and weight (well… PREVIOUS height and weight). Next to the date on the bottom though is more information relevant to the experiment. Your desired height of six inches (which was met), a list of possible side effects (none of which thankfully happened), and the length of the experiment. You can see clearly from your perspective that she had written down “One Week” as her original time frame for the experiment, but that time had been crossed off and replaced with “Two Weeks”. Was she planning on keeping you longer than you originally agreed? You get a pit in your stomach as you start looking around the desk, wondering if maybe you should be looking to escape while you still have a chance. You missed your opportunity back at the lab… maybe you can get one of her family members to help you out?.
12231.title: Mai Takes You Home With Her

choices: Kimi, Mai's Mother.  She's doing Yoga.
Mina, Mai's sister.  She's watching Anime.
It's the bathroom.  The noise is coming from a stereo.
122312.content:
You decide that despite Mai's seemingly cheery exposition, you don't feel safe in her clutches. Especially if she's going to prolong the experiment on a whim. You look around the expanse of the desk, hoping for some sort of way out. You see that her phone is plugged intot he wall at the edge of the desk, with the cable reaching down into the wall below. You feel as though you could be strong enough to climb down, and looking around the room, there isn't really much else of an option for you. You throw caution to the wind and jump at the cable, grabbing on with both arms and your legs for good measure. You find it surprisingly easy to latch on, and slide down safely inch by inch. Luckily, the cord is a bit long, so you're able to ride it all the way down. And it shouldn't be much of a surprise that your body is so small and light, you don't budge the phone on the desk in the slightest. You collect your bearings and go straight for the door, taking in the sight of Mai's oversized bed and furniture as you pass by it. It's truly a remarkable sight, and if you weren't in such desperate need to escape, you'd really want to take it all in for a few more minutes. You make it to the door, thankful that Mai hasn't returned yet. You are in no condition to actually reach the doorknob, but luckily there is another way out. Dropping to your stomach, your body is just small enough to slide underneath the door with relative ease. You crawl on your hands and knees under the door, into the open world outside. You walk to the middle of the hallway taking note of your options. There is a staircase down the hall that you are in no position to climb down just yet. There are three rooms fairly close to each other. You suspect at least one of them must be occupied, but you hear noise coming from all of them. Mai's mother or sister may be behind one of them.


Your train of thought is interrupted by the sound of giant feet climbing the staircase. Not wanting to be caught, you run quickly to the nearest door and dive underneath it, crawling quickly not to be seen as the huge figure approaches. Taking a peak outside at the booming footsteps, you see Mai coming back into her room, a huge smile on her face, and underneath her arm she's holding a fairly large pink dollhouse. You also see in her other hand a small rubber piece of lining. It's a door blocker. She had been looking to trap you in her room with no means of escaping! Looks like you made the right decision. You quickly shuffle under the rest of the door, popping out the other side with relative ease. Brushing yourself off, you hear the blasting volume of of something in the distance, and that's when you see who's room this is:
122312.title: Escaping Mai's Room

choices: Shiny Red Pumps... It's the receptionist from before!
Familiar Black Sandals... It's Mai!
12232.content:
Something about the look in Mai’s eyes makes you a little too uncomfortable to stand, and you decide to hedge your bets and climb out of her bag. It’s surprisingly easy to do as the miniature grooves and stitching of the fabric give you more than enough opportunity to grab onto and lift yourself up. Not to mention the act of climbing seems relatively simple as compared to when you were normal size. You think for a second it may be because you’re lifting significantly less weight than when you wer full size, but then again your muscles are the same size so wouldn’t it be just as difficult in theory? You don’t think about it too long because you’ve already reached the top of her bag and scaled down the side, onto the cold tile of the floor below. It’s a good thing she left her bag on the ground, otherwise you would have had a real pain climbing down the side of the stainless steel counter.

You look to the door and see that she’s left it slightly ajar. She didn’t close it the whole way! If you can make it to the outside of this room, you may be able to escape the laboratory with your life intact. Or if you feel up to it, maybe you could get help from another person outside! You scramble across the floor and make it just to the door’s opening, when all of a sudden it swings wildly from it’s stalled position. You are frozen in fear, and barely have the will to move as a massive foot slams down beside you. You were so close to an exit, but now you have to contend with the giant who just stepped in! But that’s when you realize what shoe the giantess was wearing...
12232.title: Escaping from the Bag

choices: She's holding string - She's going to tie you up!
She's holding a candy container - She's going to trap you inside!
122322.content:
You stand there still, trying not to make any noise, but as if she can feel your presence, Mai immediately looks down and sees your little body next to her foot. She gets a look of sad disappointment on her face, and crouches down next to you saying “I SEE YOU’RE GOING TO BE A BIT PROBLEMATIC. COME HERE.” She reaches out and grabs you in a fist, a little rougher than she had before. A little more careless. Just your little head is poking out of the top of her clenched hand, unable to move while she holds you. You can tell that she is not happy in the slightest, and now you're being lifted off the ground, trapped helplessly in her grasp and at her mercy.

She shakes her head back and forth in a very condescending manner and says “I THOUGHT WE UNDERSTOOD EACH OTHER. I’LL TAKE GOOD CARE OF YOU AND MAKE SURE NOTHING HURTS YOU WHILE YOU’RE TINY. IN EXCHANGE, YOU DO WHAT I TELL YOU LIKE A GOOD LITTLE MAN. BUT IF YOU INSIST ON SCAMPERING AWAY AT THE FIRST CHANCE YOU GET, I’LL JUST HAVE TO MAKE IT SO THAT IT’S HARDER FOR YOU TO GET AWAY FROM ME.” She walks over to the table and appraoches the shrink ray, tapping the side of it and messing with it’s controls. You get nervous in her hand as she continues to work on the dial, and you notice she’s switching it to get even smaller. You struggle against her mighty fingers, wiggling and shouting out of frustration. She leans in her ear to hear you clearer, and you make good on your opportunity, pleading up to her not to make you any tinier and that you were sorry for what you did. Mai looks down at you and breathes out a sigh, saying quietly “I BELIEVE YOU. I BELIEVE YOU’RE SORRY.” Her fingers release around you and she tilts her hand, allowing you to kneel down in her open palm. She gives you a small brush with her fingertip, almost as if she was trying to sooth a small pet. You feel a small moment of relief, grateful that she’s not going to do anything drastic. But then she points the barrel of the gun at your little body and says “BUT I DON’T BELIEVE YOU WON’T TRY TO ESCAPE AGAIN.”

In a flash, the girl’s palm extends outwards, and you find yourself much smaller than before. Almost 10 times smaller it feels like. By your rough estimates, judging by the size of her face beaming down at you with a cocky smirk, you’ve been shrunk down to about half an inch tall. She straightens her glasses and looks down at you, whispering “NOW THEN. YOU WON'T FIT IN A REGULAR CAGE WHILE YOU'RE SO SMALL. SO LET'S SEE IF WE CAN FIND ANOTHER WAY TO KEEP YOU CLOSE TO ME.” She reaches into a drawer and pulls out something to hold you with. She holds it up in front of you, and you dread what's coming next...
122322.title: Caught and Shrunk Again

choices: She feels you and reaches down for you
She doesn't feel you, you're too small
She shakes you off like a bug
123.content:
Your vision goes a little fuzzy, but you are aware that your size has changed. It's only made apparent just how small you've become when you feel a mountain move in your general direction and slam uncomfortably close. The impact shakes you to your core and you are thrown onto your back looking up at the sky. The ceiling seems miles away from you and the floor stretches on for miles. More importantly though the petite asian girl who you were a good foot or so taller than just a few seconds ago was now a gigantic mythical goddess standing right beside you. The thunderous boom just feet in front of you was her stepping ridiculously close to where you were. "UH OH. I THINK I MADE HIM TOO TINY. THE SETTING ON THIS THING WAS WAY OFF." You hear the goddess rumble above you as she scans the ground for your insignificant body. You are so small compared to her that she can't see you from all the way up there. And you have to stop and pause to remember that "all the way up there" is like five feet tall. The cute young giantess is looking around with a nervous look on her face, wiggling her toes in her thick black sandals and whispering to herself "I KNOW HE WAS AROUND HERE SOMEWHERE... I HOPE I DIDN'T SQUISH HIM..."

You are stunned by how close you came to being crushed by the careless college girl. Luckily she may have given you an opportunity by moving so close, as you see the treads of her black soled sandals are grooved and rugged, making them easy to climb. You brace yourself for the trip ahead and using all your strength manage to scale the side of her monstrous footwear. You are lucky that she hasn't moved, still checking the device in her hands, which gives you more than enough time to make it to the top of the sandal, directly in front of her humongous toes. Judging from their size, you can't be more than half an inch tall - even her smallest toe is roughly twice your size. Her booming voice thunders down to you in her normal voice, which seems much deeper and louder than anyone who looks like her should ever sound. "HELLO LITTLE GUY. ARE YOU STILL HERE? IF YOU ARE, MOVE AROUND OR SOMETHING. MAYBE YELL? I DON'T KNOW IF YOUR LITTLE LUNGS WILL BE VERY LOUD, BUT IT'S WORTH A SHOT. DON'T WANNA LOSE YOU UNDER MY FEET." You shout up to her, but unsurprisingly you get no response. You realize you're going to have to try and get her attention some other way, and decide to start by climbing her foot. You walk carefully into the space between her big and second toes, marvelling at the somewhat sweet odor her feet are producing. You can't help but be somewhat attracted to them, as the scent they give off mixed with the warmth of her body heat makes the situation surprisingly intimate. You attempt to climb the big toe, managing to get a hold on her smooth skin. You can only hope that she's not very ticklish...
123.title: A Bug Between Mai's Toes

choices: "IT WON'T BE FIXABLE FOR ANOTHER FEW HOURS."
"IT'LL TAKE AT LEAST A FEW WEEKS."
"IT CAN'T BE FIXED."
1231.content:
Mai gets this strange look on her face like she’s surprised and uncomfortable at the same time. You don’t really understand what that look means until she crouches down slightly and starts to move her hand towards you. At first you think she may be reaching for you, but she’s only got one finger extended. She felt you, but she doesn't think you're a person... She thinks you're an itch! You immediately drop off of her toe and run away from the massive appendage as the hand gets closer. The finger aggressively rubs against the toe, the nail bringing up a small amount of dead skin underneath it as it viciously scrapes the skin. You imagine you wouldn't have lasted that long if you were still clinging to the side of it. Luckily you won't have to try something like that again, as Mai directs her attention to the itchy toe, and spots your little body on the edge of the sandal. She holds her other hand up to her mouth in shock as if to stifle a scream and she whispers "OH MY GOD! OH MY GOD! I ALMOST KILLED YOU! I'M SOOO SORRY! HERE, GET UP OFF THE GROUND BEFORE I STEP ON YOU OR SOMETHING!" She lays her palm flat on the ground directly touching the sandal, and you manage to jump over the small gap between the shoe and her skin. It takes you a good few seconds to run to the middle of her palm, and you immediately sit down on the soft, scaly skin, waiting for her to bring you up. The experience is extraordinary as she brings you up hundreds of stories to her waiting eyes. Behind her thick glasses you can see a wave of relief, happiness, and guilt in each one of her expressions. But you're a little busy being blown away by the sight of her giant face so close to you. you can't even see the whole thing from your perspective, that's how tiny you've become.

“SORRY I ALMOST SMUSHED YOU WITH MY FINGER. IT’S JUST THAT WHEN I FELT YOUR LITTLE BODY NEXT TO MY TOES, I THOUGHT YOU WERE A BUG OR AN ITCH OR SOMETHING… I’M NOT MAKING THINGS ANY BETTER AM I?” You shake your head and she sighs saying “SORRY. IT’S JUST… WOW, YOU’RE TINY. I MEAN YOU WERE SUPPOSED TO BE SMALL AND ALL, BUT NOT THIS MUCH! YOU’RE LIKE, SMALLER THAN A PEA! AN ANT! LOOKING AT YOU IN MY PALM LIKE THAT IT’S JUST SO… OH, I’M DOING IT AGAIN, AREN’T I?” At this point you’re visibly frustrated with the giant girl’s involuntary taunting, and she can tell as she blushes and looks down away from you saying “SORRY, SORRY. I’LL TRY NOT TO MAKE YOU FEEL WORSE. LET’S TALK ABOUT GETTING YOU BACK TO NORMAL SIZE.” The giantess moves around the room, heading back to where the shrink ray was on the desk, and you can see from your perspective in her palm a small amount of smoke rising from it’s location. Mai sees this too and her already enormous eyes grow even wider with shock. “NO! NO, NO, NO! THIS ISN’T GOOD!” She lowers her hand down to the tabletop, and it takes you a minute to climb off of it to make sure you don’t break your legs from the fall. That’s how insignificant you’ve become. Once you’re clear, Mai puts all her attention on the device, checking the smoking barrel and running all sorts of diagnostics tests on it. You take the opportunity to walk over to some loose medical supplies on the edge of the table, marvelling at the scale of it all. There is a pile of Q-tips on the edge of the table, and you walk right up to one of them, falling backwards into the tip. Maybe being so small will have it's advantages, you think to yourself, as you continue to relax on what you can only describe as the world's comfiest seat. After a few minutes, Mai scans the table looking for you again, finding you in your resting place and almost snorting with laughter. She collects herself and leans in closer as you step off the huge ear-cleaner and she addresses you.

“SORRY FOR LAUGHING. THIS IS ALL JUST SO WEIRD. IT'S A LOT TO TAKE IN." You wave your arms up and down as if to say "You think YOU'VE got a lot to take in?" She recognizes the folly of her mistake and says "RIGHT, RIGHT. ON TO BUSINESS. DO YOU WANT THE GOOD NEWS FIRST OR THE BAD NEWS?” You don’t like the sound of that, and she doesn’t really wait to let you choose as she says “WELL THE GOOD NEWS IS YOU LOOKED SUPER CUTE ON THAT Q-TIP, AND I’M SURE IF WE TOOK A PICTURE OF YOU ON THERE IT WOULD GET LIKE A MILLION HITS.” You are unamused and she bites her lip, saying “RIGHT. SORRY. BAD NEWS. HERE IT IS: THE DEVICE OVERHEATED. SHRINKING YOU SO MUCH AT ONCE CAUSED IT TO GO A LITTLE HAYWIRE, AND IT WON’T WORK IN IT’S CURRENT STATE.” You ask her how long it’s going to take to fix, completely forgetting that you’re way too tiny for her to hear you like this. You can tell she’s stalling as she shrugs her shoulders. So when she looks back down at you through the magnifier, you aggressively point to your watch. She gets the message and says “RIGHT. TIME. HOW LONG WILL THAT TAKE TO FIX. UH… THAT’S THE THING…”
1231.title: Almost Itched Out Of Existence

choices: It shot Mai... She's shrinking down to your size!
It shot Mai... She's shrinking down to your size... AND YOU WITH HER
It shot you... You're changing size yet again!
1232.content:
While the giant girl has stopped walking for the moment, you take the opportunity to reach higher ground... even if that ground is just at the top of her foot. You climb to the top of Mai’s unpainted big toe and start pounding on the nail but to no avail. You start jumping up and down but she still doesn’t notice you. Your weight is just that insignificant that even on her sensitive feet, you can’t cause any sensation that is noticable from her giant form. All you can do is stand on her toe and try not to get tossed off as she repositions her foot back and forth.
Mai looks around the room, obviously upset that she lost you after just one use of her shrink ray. She holds the gun up to her eyes and readjusts her glasses, obviously trying to work out what went wrong.

“DAMN. I CALIBRATED THE SIZE RATIO TOO FAR. I WANTED HIM TO BE SOMEWHERE ALONG THE LINE OF SIX INCHES. AT THIS POINT HE’S PROBABLY ONLY ABOUT 1/12 THAT SIZE.” It’s a little unnerving and also calming to realize that you were right about your height. You’re only somewhere around a half an inch tall. That doesn’t help your plight any more as your constant attempts to get Mai’s attention still fall on deaf ears. From up above, you hear the machine whir back to life as Mai continues to tool around with the settings. You get a bad feeling in the pit of your stomach as Mai says “PERHAPS IF I RESET THIS PARAMETER HERE… AND PULLED THE TRIGGER…” She’s going to shoot it again? Where is it aiming? You don’t even have time to react before you see a bright green light shoot down around you yet again...
1232.title: Waiting for results on Mai's Big Toe

choices: She asks you to try and unshrink her right now
She asks you to take her home with you
She asks you to take her to see someone
124.content:
The beam doesn't exactly hit you, it sails over your shoulder and reflects back immediately. You look backwards to see what happened and see that there is a mirror directly behind you. Putting two and two together you slowly turn back and no longer see the student. Just a pile of her clothing lying on the floor, with a moving bulge beneath it. The bump seems to travel through the clothes and out towards one of the sleeves of her shirt, until it's exposed to the light. There, clear as day, stands the girl who tried to shoot you with the ray gun, only she's now no more than 5 inches tall. She looks around the room for a second, trying to take it all in, before focusing on you directly. She lets out a small shriek of surprise, holding her hands up to her mouth to stop herself. She takes a few deep breaths and you hear her little voice squeak out "Okay. Okay. Uh, this is bad. This is really bad and I am really small."
