She steps over her shirt and onto the cold linoleum of the laboratory floor, inching her way over to you. You don't really do much, you're too shocked yourself. She manages to wave up to you from the ground and meekly shout up "Hey... A little help?"

You slowly drop to your knees and lay your palm flat on the ground for her to climb on to. She scampers over your fingers and centers herself in your palm, crouching down as she's lifted off the ground. When you have her at about chest level, she raises up to her full height, finally comfortable with the ground she's standing on, and throws her arms up in frustration. You can't help but marvel at how adorable she looks standing in your hand. Like a little doll, perfectly proportional, only living and breathing. You instinctively poke her with your free hand, almost to prove to yourself that this is real, and she laughs a little bit at your invasive touch. She waves away your massive finger and says "Stop that. That tickles my... Oh my god!" In a sudden burst of realization she curls up slightly, shielding her bare breasts and crotch from your view. "This is so... SO embarassing." She blushes hard as she straightens back up, and you're amazed at how well she's handling the situation. She doesn't seem scared or humiliated, just frustrated at not only how the experiment has played out so far, but now she's naked in front of someone who was SUPPOSED to be her test subject.

The little asian doll paces slowly across your palm, her miniature footsteps tickling you slightly as she moves.. When she faces away from you, you can't help but stare at her cute little bare behind. She thinks for a second and says "Well first thing's first, i have to get back to normal size. Then i have to get some clothes on and try to forget that this ever happened.
Would you mind helping me, it's not like i can use the controls when i'm this small." You look down at her clothes and see what she means: The shrink ray she was using hasn't gotten small with her. It's your size.
124.title: Mai is a doll!

choices: "... My Professor, Miss Freeman."
"... My lab friend, Amy."
"... My mother."
1243.content: You pick up the shrink ray with your free hand, and the little girl in your palm freaks out as she squeaks up "Be careful with that! I don't want you shrinking too.... expecially while you're holding me!" You carefully pack the gun back up in the bag Mai brought it in, and lifted it up. You ask Mai where she wants to go and she says "Well i don't think i can do this on my own. I'm in way over my head. And there's only one person who i think is smart enough to help us out right now..."
1243.title: Who Does Mai Want you to Take Her to?

choices: One - You shrink to half your size
Two - You shrink to a foot tall
Three - You shrink to 6 inches tall
A handful - You shrink to microscopic size!
You change your mind and spit them out.
13.content:
You are greeted by a tall woman, looking to be in her late thirties, wearing a stylish black work dress. She's wearing black stilletto heels that match with her ensemble, and she seems very determined in the way she walks towards you. She extends her hand out swiftly and states "Hello. You may refer to me as Mrs. Blair for the duration of the experiment." You are a bit thrown off by her stern british accent, but accept her handshake and sit up straight as she opens a briefcase before you. She adjusts her thick, brown rimmed glasses and brushes long strands of black hair away from her face as she roots through the back for a second. "Have you been pre-screened?" she asks without looking up at you. You stammer out a yes and she says "Excellent. We can get started right away." She produces from the bag a small pill bottle and hands it to you. She walks to the other end of the room to grab a chair and says "Read the instructions very carefully and injest the pills accordingly. I won't be babying you through the procedure, so I expect you'll be able to read directions without any assistance."

You read the pill bottle and it all seems straightforward, except for the part about the dosage. You can see that it says to take it orally, but the actual dose amount has been smeared and you can't quite read out the number. You start to speak up but she just rolls her eyes and sighs "Are you an adult or are you not?" You sit there silently confused as she sits in her chair, dangling her long heels off of her foot in an effort to amuse herself. She clicks a pen in her hand and starts to write down some notes as she said "I trusted you to be able to follow a simple task. Don't end this experiment before it has a chance to start due to your incompetence." You say screw it, throw caution to the wind and take the pill bottle to your mouth. Mrs. Blair's eyebrows raise slightly as she smiles and says "There we go. Now let's see what effect the pills will have on you..."

How many did you take?
13.title: Medicine time with Mrs. Blair

choices: You climb in quickly, not wanting to upset her
You hesitate and she throws you in
You try to escape from her
133.content:
You are speechless in front of the domineering woman’s shoes, looking up with awe as she looks down at you. Her head nods off to the side as she looks down at you, and the air gets tense as you can't tell whether or not she's pleased with your transformation. Her shoes slightly raise and slam against the ground, the clack of her sole hitting the tile reverberating in your ears. Finally your fears are quelled as she lets out a small satisfied sigh and says “AT LAST, WE HAVE A PROPER FORMULA. THE LABORATORY FINALLY DID SOMETHING RIGHT FOR A CHANGE.” She reaches down and lifts you off the ground swiftly, her fingers not really taking much care as she grabs you. She grips tightly around your waist, leaving the top half of your body exposed. With her other hand, she takes your arm and lightly squeezes it, as if testing to see if anything on you is broken. She's not incredibly careful with your little body, and you fear that she is going to accidentally tear your arm right out of it's socket. She fixes her glasses, saying very matter-of-factly “LIMBS SEEM FUNCTIONAL. SPEAK FOR ME?” You try and stammer out a sentence but she just shakes her head, visibly irritated and says “LOOKS LIKE DIRECT COMMUNICATION WILL BE IMPOSSIBLE, YOUR VOICE IS RATHER SQUEAKY AND ANNOYING. SO FROM NOW ON NO TALKING, ONLY LISTENING, UNDERSTOOD?” You say yes in response and she rolls her eyes, and squeezes her hand slightly, sending a shockwave of pain through your lower back and legs. You struggle vainly against her huge powerful fingers, when she leans in closer and coldly whispers “I SAID… NO TALKING. UNDERSTOOD?” You nod up and down, not wanting to anger her further and she smiles a devilish grin and says “GOOD. THEN WE CAN CONTINUE.”


She places you on the metal table in front of her and reaches underneath with both hands, accidentlly exposing her bountiful cleavage right in front of you. You look for a split second but turn away quickly, trying hard not to anger the giant woman in any way. She lets out a low chuckle behind you and says "I SAW THAT. IT'S GOOD TO KNOW YOU AREN'T A TOTAL PERVERT AFTER ALL." You are almost two embarrased to turn around, but a loud clanging sound shifts your attention back to the other side of the table. She has placed onto the table next to you a large silver cage. Well... at least to your perspective it seems large enough. To a normal person it would be the type of thing you'd carry a hamster or a guinea pig in. She unlocks the cage door, causing it to swing open in front of you, and then she raises her eyebrows expectedly. You point to the cage fearing that she's going to be treating you like some sort of rodent for the rest of the experiment, and your worst thoughts are all but confirmed when she says in a visibly annoyed manner "WELL, COME ON THEN. WE HAVE A LOT TO DO TODAY, SO STOP MUCKING ABOUT AND GET IN."
133.title: The Proper Size For Her

choices: She lays her finger down for you to climb onto
She brings her hand down fast to squash you!
You don't let her get  you - Jump!
134.content:
Almost immediately after you swallow the pills, they start to take effect. First a tingling sensation surges through your limbs, followed by
a slight chill. Then, you feel as if your clothing is getting heavier on you. And the room is rising before you. The pills she gave you are making you shrink! You don't really panic as much as you rightfully should in this situation, thinking that if this weren't meant to happen, Ms. Blair would be having a much more surprised reaction on her face. She doesn't seem surprised... but at the same time doesn't look pleased. She taps a pen to her notepad and says "This isn't right. You're reducing at a much higher rate than originally calculated. Just how many of those did you take?" You reply that you're not sure, maybe more than three. She sighs loudly and holds the bridge of her nose with two fingers. Clearly you've taken too much. "Every one of those pills was carefully calibrated to your body weight and very expensive. Not only have you skewed my data, but now you're costing me money. Well, at the very least we can see what happens when someone overdoses on the medication."

She continues to belittle you even more so than the pills are already doing for you. She has now gotten off the chair and is walking up to face you, crouching down so she can look you in the eyes. You have stepped out of your clothes which are now incredibly oversized, and you continue to pass the height of a child, becoming closer to the size of a Ken doll in a rather quick fashion. Ms. Blair's voice is slightly deeper and louder now, clearly an indication of just how small you're becoming in her presence. "ONCE. JUST ONCE I'D LIKE TO SEE A MAN COME IN HERE WHO DOESN'T HAVE HIS HEAD SO FAR UP HIS OWN ASS THAT HE CAN LISTEN TO A SIMPLE INSTRUCTION. IF YOU HAD JUST TAKEN THE DOSAGE I TOLD YOU TO, YOU'D BE FINE. NOW, I'LL BE HONEST, I DON'T KNOW WHAT'S GOING TO HAPPEN TO YOU. ALL I KNOW IS THAT YOU'RE GOING TO BE MUCH, MUCH SMALLER THAN YOU ARE RIGHT NOW."

The monolithic woman gets on her knees to see you even more closely, Her nose is level with the table and her eyes are gazing down at your ever-dwindling form on the lab table. The giantess shakes her head and says "PATHETIC. JUST A PATHETIC LITTLE SPECK. AT THIS RATE YOU'LL PROBABLY NEVER STOP SHRINKING. JUST GETTING SMALLER AND SMALLER UNTIL YOU CEASE TO EXIST ALTOGETHER. OR MAYBE YOU'LL STOP SHRINKING AT JUST SMALL ENOUGH THAT A SPECK OF DUST WILL COME FLOATING IN THE WIND AND CRUSH YOU DO DEATH. EITHER WAY, YOU'VE RUINED THIS EXPERIMENT FOR ME. I HOPE YOU'RE HAPPY, YOU LITTLE FLEA." You are just a fraction of an inch tall, staring up at her in awe as she lowers a massive hand towards you. You know that whatever she has planned for you next, it won't be pretty.
134.title: You've Overdosed!

choices: A very diluted strain - You'll shrink slowly for the next few days
a partially diluted strain - You'll shrink every few hours
an untouched strain - you'll shrink every few minutes
an advanced strain - you'll shrink immediately to a pre-determined size
a mutated strain - you'll only shrink under certain circumstances
14.content:
The doctor walks in, and you try to make eye contact with her, but looking straight ahead your gaze only goes up to the nametag on the breast level of her jacket reading "Charlene". You're admittedly not too short of a guy, but looking at her it's hard to believe that there's anybody on her level. She was an impressively tall amazon of a woman, maybe scraping just under 6 foot 5. She removes her jacket almost to make you feel even more insecure as she shows off her incredibly well toned arms and shoulders. She ties her long brunette hair back into a ponytail and the way she stands and collects herself, she looks like the definition of a fitness model. She introduces herself as Charlene, and says she's a medical student at the university. She looks at a chart with your name on it and says "Everything seems to be in order. Tell me, do you have a problem with needles?" Before you can answer, she swings her arm swiftly into your arm and sticks a needle in. You yelp in surprise and pain and she just shrugs. "Sorry. It's just easier if it's a surprise."

She presses down on the plunger and when the contents are empty, she removes the needle, packing it back away. She crosses her legs and says "Now i'll bet you're wondering just what i put in you, huh?" She looks very intimidating as she crosses her arms and explains "A few years ago, a group of our researchers wandered into an abandoned temple near the bank of the Amazon river, after picking up some strange readings. When the team came out, it was obvious that their bodies had undergone a bit of change The plants in the area were coated in a particular strain of bacteria. One that we've managed to store and replicate and... place inside your body." She flexed her impressive muscles, indicating that she had been on the team she was talking about! "The women all experienced a bit of growth. Some extra height. Enhanced senses, and a much more... shall we say... enlarged muscle mass." You started to put the pieces together in your head and asked what happened to the men. She lifts them up off the ground and brings them up to her face saying "LAUNDRY DAY"S TOMORROW. GUESS I'LL THROW THIS IN THE BIN. UNLESS..." You can see an outline of the giant woman's face through the fabric you've hidden yourself in, and she leans in closer, pressing her nose against the outside and giving the panties a big sniff. She shrugs her shoulders and says "ACTUALLY THESE ARE PROBABLY STILL GOOD. I'LL WEAR THEM TOMORROW." You're amazed you haven't been caught while being literally held in her hands, but you don't have too long to celebrate before the panty prison is released from her grip, landing softly on a countertop without even so much as a thud.

Making your way out of your cloth prison, your eyes readjust to find that she's placed the crumpled up panties atop a dresser near her bed. She is standing in front of her full length mirror, muttering to herself as she undresses. "LITTLE MAN. LITTLE STUPID BUG MAN IN MY HOUSE. I KNEW I SHOULD HAVE PUT UP MORE GUARDS OUTSIDE. JUST THE THOUGHT OF ANOTHER PERVY LITTLE MAN SNEAKING HIS WAY INTO MY HOUSE MAKES ME SICK." You look to your left and find the giant woman's makeup kit, a few small jewelry boxes, and a set of deodorants and scented oils. You manage to find a bottle of perfume scaled at the perfect height to hide your minute body, and in an effort to remain undetected you sneak behind it. You peak out from your hiding spot to see that she has removed all of her clothes, and is stretching and yawning in front of the mirror. Her body is well formed with perky D-cup breasts and a large plump ass. She's not skinny by any means, but definitely far from fat. Just the perfect amount of curves and beauty. She turns quickly towards your position, her long red hair whipping back to the other side of her body as she does so. She takes five massive steps in your direction, and you freeze in fear as she reaches down towards you. You hold your hands up and brace for impact, but the massive well-kept fingers pluck a small jar of cream next to you, and she doesn't seem to acknowledge your whereabouts. She takes a finger and dips it into the jar, removing a small amount and placing it just under her eyes. She continues talking to herself as she does so, whispering "THEN AGAIN, IT HAS BEEN AGES SINCE I'VE HAD A REAL VISITOR. MAYBE I WON'T SMUSH THE NEXT MAN WHO FINDS HIMSELF AT MY FEET. IT'S STILL SO RUDE THOUGH... THE LEAST THE LITTLE MEN COULD DO IS ALLOW ME THE CHANCE TO MEET THEM AT THE DOOR." She slams the jar down onto the countertop and sighs long and hard, turning back towards the wall to put out the candles. As she blows them out, the moonlight continues to frame her gorgeous body and hair as she slowly makes her way onto the mattress, lays down to rest, and within a few minutes is sound asleep. You look at her soft bellly rising slowly and falling with each breathe, and you know that she is out cold. You even hedge your bets by shouting out to her, but your little voice only carries so far. You let out a sigh of relief as you collect your thoughts, just as a booming familiar narration enters your head.

"IT APPEARS THE GIANT HAS GONE TO BED... BUT THE LITTLE MAN IS STILL WIDE AWAKE. I WONDER WHAT HE'LL DO NOW THAT THE BIG WOMAN OF THE HOUSE IS FAST ASLEEP..."

You think to yourself and decide to take advantage of the situation...
15533311311.title: Unseen in the Giant's Bedroom

choices: It lands behind you, allowing you to make it!
It lands in front of you, blocking your path!
It lands directly on top of you, squishing you!
1553331132.content:
Unfortunately you can’t angle your descent at quite the right angle and when the dress runs out of fabric, you find yourself in a freefall heading right for the giant’s bare foot. With an unimpressive plop, you land directly on the top of Donna’s foot, your chest and face hitting the soft, giving skin of her dorsal area, rolling off almost immediately next to the massive peds. Her toes tap the floor in succession, giving you the impression that your landing has caught her attention. This is only made more apparent when you roll onto your back and see the massive redhead looking down at her feet with a devilish grin. “I THOUGHT I FELT SOMETHING CRAWLING AROUND DOWN THERE. YOU’D BETTER COME UP HERE WITH ME BEFORE YOU GET STEPPED ON, LITTLE BUG.” Her massive body crouches down as she reaches between her feet with one arm, fingers extended to pluck you off the ground. You quickly scamper to your feet and make a b-line for the area between her legs.

Without looking, you can feel her hand smack firmly against the ground as she reaches down for you, and a rumbling laughter showers over you as you continue running past her legs. “OOH, IT LOOKS LIKE THE LITTLE MAN DOESN’T WANT TO BE GRABBED BY THE BIG BAD GIANT… LOOKS LIKE SOMEONE WANTS TO BE CHASED…” You try to ignore her taunting and you see at the edge of the room is a dresser that appears to be mounted to the wall. It’s a long shot, but you may be able to crawl underneath it, and even with all her might she probably won’t be able to remove it from it’s place on the side of the room. You’d be safe… relatively speaking. But it’s hard to concentrate on your goal as you hear booming footsteps in the distance as the giantess squares herself up to look at you. While running you take a glance over your shoulder and see her slowly raise her foot up with her hands placed defiantly on her hips. “OH I SEE WHAT YOU’RE TRYING TO DO. WELL I THINK I KNOW THE ONLY THING THAT’S APPROPRIATE TO SAY IN THIS INSTANCE… FEE!”

Her foot comes down hard on the last word, filling you with dread as you know what’s coming. It will only take a few of her long strides to catch up to you even when you’re running at top speed. You try to power over it and keep your eyes on your destination under the dresser, but another footstep lands closer to you with the giantess bellowing down at you “FI!” The safe area under the dresser is definitely within your reach, however it is entirely up to Donna’s pace whether or not she catches you. Were she walking at a normal rate, you have no doubt in your mind she’d be able to stop you… or at the very worst crush you beneath her soles. But you can’t let that thought enter your mind. You’re almost there. But that’s when another footstep comes uncomfortably close, followed by Donna’s deep voice shouting joyously “FO!” With that last step you are almost tossed off your balance as not only the foot’s thunderous stomp behind you shakes the ground, but there is also a gust of wind that accompanies it.

You are so insignificant on her floor that her footstep nearby propels you forward, but also carries with it a faint odor of sweat mixed with perfume. You don’t want to think of what it will be like being pressed underneath the unforgiving, mountainous foot of a giant woman, so you keep running. Despite the tired feeling in your bones and the dry breaths coming from your throat, you are almost underneath the safety of the giant woman’s furniture. And that’s when you feel a shadow cast over you, and the massive woman shouts triumphantly “FUM.” You can feel the gigantic foot coming down towards you. The only question is… were you fast enough?
1553331132.title: Chased by the Giant's Feet!

choices: Alice
The Mad Hatter
The Queen of Hearts
15533312.content:
Donna's voice cracks the darkness and with one sentence your entire world changes:

"Our story begins with a quick fall down a rabbit hole."

You immediately feel yourself falling for what seems like an eternity, watching a series of clocks, table ornaments, and playing cards whiz by. Your fall turns into a light floating sensation as you find yourself landing on the ground without a scratch. You look around and see a beautiful wooded area, with the strangest flowers you've ever seen. Some of them even appear to be trying to talk to you, but you don't really want to get into a conversation with the wildlife just yet until you figure out exactly where you are. It doesn't take long however, as the narration returns...

"Our hero finds themselves in a very strange place, where nothing makes sense and everything is madness. They have found themselves in the woods of Wonderland."

Being very familiar with the story of Alice in Wonderland, you're not sure exactly what's going to happen next, but you know a few of the rules: Nothing makes sense in the slightest, madness reigns, and if you eat or drink anything, you won't be staying at that size for very long.
You start to go over a plan of action in your head, when your thoughts are interrupted by a familiar voice calling out to you saying "Excuse me, is someone there?" It's not as omnipresent as the voice that appears during the narration, but you can clearly tell it's her. Donna is not only narrating the story, it would appear that she is also playing a major role. She takes a few more steps towards you, and you can clearly see that she is dressed as...
15533312.title: A Trip to Wonderland

choices: Shrinking!
Growing!
155333121.content:
Through the brush, decked in a billowy white and blue dress stands Donna. Er…. Alice. Her originally straight ginger hair is now a bright red stack of curls, held in blace by a long black ribbon. She skips over towards you and gives you a quick hug. “It’s so nice to see another person here in Wonderland. There are quite a few unusual creatures about, have you not noticed?” You mention that you’ve heard of Wonderland before, but she’s the first person you’ve encountered. To be fair, you just got there. Alice sighs a breathe of exhaustion and says “I’ve had quite the adventure today. I’ve been as big as a house and as little as a thimble in the space of just a few moments. It’s quite easy to change your size if your’e not too picky about what you put in your mouth here.” She gasps in realization of something as she reaches into her pockets. “In fact… The mushrooms that caused me to change size… i still have them! Would you like to see them?”

Before you can answer she’s already pulled them out and presented them to you. Her excited smile disappears as she regards the both of them in her hand. A pensive look crosses her face as she says “Hmmm… in my haste i kind of pocketed the two of them rather quickly… i don’t know which one is which. One is supposed to make you larger, and the other is supposed to make you smaller.” She weighs the two of them in her hand, trying to decipher which one has any distinquishing characteristics. She shrugs and says “Well… there’s really only one way to find out.” She puts one of the mushrooms away, and while holding the other one, breaks off a small piece between her fingers. She begins to bring it up to her mouth but then gets a playful look across her face. She holds the piece out to you and says “On second thought… why don’t YOU try it. I’ve done quite enough changing of sizes for a while.” You hesitate for a second, not sure if you want to go through with it. In your pause, you hear the booming voice of the narration say through the trees “THE VISITOR TO WONDERLAND WOULD HAVE TO TAKE THE MUSHROOM IF HE’D LIKE THE STORY TO CONTINUE. OTHERWISE, WE’LL HAVE TO STOP HERE FOR NOW.”

Alice giggles and says “You heard the lady. Open wide!” Before you can question how the character who is CLEARLY Donna is taking instruction from the narration who is the SAME PERSON, Alice takes the piece of mushroom and shoves it between your lips. It slides down your throat without much chewing and has a surprisingly sweet taste to it. You feel your insides start to shake as Alice takes a step back. “Don’t want you to step on me if you get too large… and i don’t want to step on YOU if the opposite were to happen!” Her giggling rumbles through your ears as the mushroom’s magic begins to take hold… You’re definitely...
155333121.title: Meeting Alice

choices: In her cleavage
On top of a large piece of cake
In Donna's teacup!
155333122.content:
Dressed in strange, multicolored clothing and a massive hat, Donna comes in through the brush and approaches you with a smile. She gives you a big hug and says "You're just in time! Come! Come! The party's about to begin!" You realize that she's playing the part of the Mad Hatter, which means you must be headed to her tea party. Sure enough, after a few minutes of wandering through the woods, you come across an open field with a huge table, with settings set for roughly 20 or so guests. Donna grabs you by the hand and leads you to the front of the table, shoving you into a seat and sitting down at the seat at the head, directly next to you. You admire the colorful array of sweets and flowers decorating the table as Donna begins pouring a small cup of tea for the two of you. She shoves it in your hands and clanks it in a toast, before taking a quick sip. Obviously the tea is safe to drink, otherwise she wouldn't have had some, so you indulge as well, taking in the delicious taste and actually enjoying yourself. The tea party goes about as well as expected, with the Hatter expressing some utter nonsense with every sentence, but you can't help but be engaged with the conversation. You are so engrossed with your surroundings that you don't even notice that Donna seems to be rising a bit higher than normal. It's only when Donna cuts herself off and looks you up and down that you begin to feel as if something is off.

"Tell me... where you come from, do people tend to change size often? Or does it just happen in occasions of fancy dress?" You realize she's right, you seem to be shrinking in your seat! You look down at your empty glass and figure that it was the tea that is changing your size. You put down the glass and feel yourself get smaller. The Donna Hatter looks at you with a smile and says in a much deeper voice than before "BE A SPORT AND PASS THE SUGAR, WOULD YOU?" You see the sugar bowl to your left and reach to grab it. Your arms have gotten way too short to reach it however, and you find yourself leaning over the table to even budge it. Hoisting yourself upon the table itself, you walk right up to the bowl, and are stunned to find that it's now just under your chin in height. You put your shoulder into the side, only managing to move it a few inches (by YOUR scale) before it's height surpasses yours. You are about to give it another go when a massive hand grasps the handle and lifts it out of your line of vision. As it lifts out of your line of sight, Donna's voice booms overhead with a resounding "NEVERMIND, I'VE GOT IT." Looking up at the woman on the end of the table, you are shocked into silence by the sight of The Mad Hatter, now appearing upwards of 100 feet tall! She drops a sugar cube into her tea with a resounding splash, and places the bowl back down right where you are! You manage to dive out of the way before the humongous server slams against the table, the clanking silverware shaking in your eardrums. Donna reaches down and effortlessly plucks your shrunken body off of the table, bringing you up to her heavily made-up visage. She inspects you with increasing curiosity as you dangle helplessly between her thumb and forefinger.

"MY, THERE'S HARDLY ANYTHING LEFT OF YOU AT ALL, IS THERE? YOU'VE CLOSED UP LIKE A TELESCOPE AND NOW YOU'RE SMALLER THAN A MOUSE! WHAT AN INTERESTING UNBIRTHDAY THIS HAS BECOME FOR ME!" Donna dangles you in front of her face as a wicked smile crosses her lips. Her eyes dart around her placement at the table as she says "BUT I CAN'T JUST HOLD YOU ALL DAY, MY HAND WILL GET TIRED. SO I'LL JUST PUT YOU DOWN HERE FOR NOW..." Donna suddenly releases the grip she has on your leg, causing you to freefall back down to the table! But before you can splat against the ground, your fall is broken by something soft... you've landed...
155333122.title: Donna The Mad Hatter

choices: She sips you up!
You manage to avoid her lips!
1553331223.content:
With a resounding splash, you end up in a hot pool of flavored water. You resurface, spitting out some of the drink, and notice a human-sized sugar cube slowly melting away in the heat of the water. You look up and see Donna's massive face staring down at you, a quirky smirk on her face as she taunts you. "I THOUGHT YOU'D HAD ENOUGH TEA, BUT NOW YOU'RE GOING TO HAVE SOME OF MINE? I GUESS I'LL HAVE TO DRINK IT ALL BEFORE IT'S GONE." The cup shakes and lifts into the sky as Donna takes a drink. Her huge, plush lips are curved around the opening to the cup, and you struggle to swim away from her as she takes a small sip. She smacks her lips loudly and breaks the suction, causing you to float back, with waves of tea crashing at you from all sides. She continues holding the cup in her hand, and dips a massive finger in, circling it around and trapping you in a pint-sized whirlpool. You are truly pathetic, being shaken and stirred by the humongous redhead's index finger, unable to escape a cup of tea in her hands. She licks the tea off of her finger and laughs at your little body bobbing out of the tea, saying "OH, STILL SWIMMING ABOUT DOWN THERE! JUST TRY NOT TO DRINK ANY MORE OF MY TEA. IT DOESN'T SEEM TO BE DOING YOU ANY FAVORS IN THE HEIGHT DEPARTMENT!"
You didn't even realize it, but the walls of the teacup are much farther apart than when you first fell in. Donna's face seems even more impressively large. The tea is still shrinking you when it gets into your mouth! You have to try not to shrink anymore, but the situation seems hopeless. It's hard enough to stay afloat in the tea and keep your mouth shut without the giantess holding the cup trying to make you her snack. This day just will not end.

You try desperately not to drink any more of the tea, not wanting to evaporate out of thin air, but the drink around you starts to wave and shake as the giant hatter brings the cup up to her lips. With a wicked smile and a satisfied chuckle, she says "MY, I CERTAINLY AM THIRSTY TODAY. WILL NOTHING QUENCH THIS THIRST?" You start to panic as the entire cup tilts slightly in one direction, with Donna's waiting lips awaiting you on the way out. She's drinking you! She's actually going to drink you up! You try to swim against the current, but the force of her slurping sip is just too much for you to handle. You are pulled along with an impressive amount of the ocean you're currently swimming in, right towards Donna's mouth. Her puckered lips form a vaccuum that you don't think you can escape from as you feel the cup empty around you, carrying you with it.
1553331223.title: A Shrinking Drink

Soemthing else?

15533313.title: A Different Story World...

choices: You are tied to the ground... surrounded by tiny women!
You are lifted high above the ground, held by a giant woman!
You are found on the beach by a traveller!
155333131.content:
Donna's voice carries through the air as a constant narration.

"Our story begins with a simple-minded traveller, looking for adventure and fortune, whatever form it may take. His travels have been easygoing until one fateful day, when he finds himself caught in the midst of a terrible storm!"

You realize that her telling of the story is going to shape the world around you, and you brace for impact as you find yourself on the deck of a ship, wind whipping past you at breakneck speed, and a harsh salty rain cascading around you. The ship is thrown to and fro by the ragin storm around you, the likes of which you've never seen! Men attempting to secure the sails and ropes together are thrown overboard by the jostling and rumbling of the sea. Cargo comes flying out from secured rooms, scattering all over the deck. And the skies thunder with a sense that this storm will never stop, and will just keep coming. You manage to grab onto a rope connected to the main mast, and brace for impact as a massive wave approaches. Unable to do anything but watch, you close your eyes and feel the water rush over you as the ship is torn apart by the force. You black out for what seems like ages, until you are jostled back into reality by the sound of a familiar voice...

"Our hero awakens much later, the feeling of sea water still rattling around in his lungs. Little does he know, he's in a much different land than he originally expected he'd be..."

You manage to cough the water out of your body and can barely sit up from the aches and pains you've gathered on your journey. Tilting your head slightly, you can see that you've landed on a beach of some sort that stretches on for miles at a time. There is no sign of the boat or any of the men on board for that matter, and you consider yourself totally stranded on this alien shore. Then again, maybe you're not as alone as you thought, as you can clearly sense a commotion happening around you...

1553333.title: Even more choices

choices: She's going to put you into her body!
She's going to make you even smaller!
She's going to join you?!
15533331.content:
"Hello, thank you for volunteering!" You are greeted at the door by the woman running the experiment: A larger woman with short hair and glasses. She's got a cute smile and bright ruby lipstick, accompanying her cheery disposition as she walks to the other side of the room. "My name is Kourtney and i'll be running the test today. Before we start, do you get seasick easily?" You respond no, and she immediately follows "How about claustrophobic? Sensitive to changing pressures? Do you get easily disoriented?" You say you don't think so and she sighs a breathe of relief saying "Oh thank god. The last four volunteers weren't up to the task, and let's just say things got a little messy." She reaches into her pocket and pulls out something that she lays on her palm in front of you. It appears to be a toy spaceship, somewhere close to six inches long. If you had to describe the shape, it was very similar to the Planet Express from Futurama, with a bright bluish-green paint job to match. It's incredibly detailed, and you can even see a small cockpit that you could swear was just as intriquite and put together as the rest of the ship. Kourtney seems to beam with pride as she regards you marveling at the toy in her hand. "Impressive, isn't it? It's the first of it's kind. And best of all, it's fully operational." You are a bit distracted by her statements and say "I'm sorry, what do you mean 'Operational'?" Kourtney cocks her head and says "Well of course it works. How else are you going to get around if the ship doesn't work?" You take a step back and are about to ask what she means by that when she points a remote-control looking device at you and flips a switch, immediately bathing you in bright green light.

When you feel the light fade, you're no longer staring at the top part of Kourtney's head. Instead you're looking at the rubber sole of her work boot, magnified hundreds of times over. A distant giggle from above causes you to crane your head upwards, and you see that the light she shot you with was some sort of laser, and it has shrunk you down to a minuscule size. The giant woman before you crouches down to get a better look at you, and you fall backwards in surprise, amazed that someone so big has the capabilities of moving so fast. Her flesh jiggles as she laughs at your predicament and says "AWW, DON'T BE SCARED OF ME, I WON'T HURT YOU. JUST HOLD STILL, OKAY?" Against your basic instinct to jump away from her imposing form, you stand perfectly still and watch as the woman's chubby fingers reach down for you. With unbelievable grace and care, you are lifted off the ground by the giantess's thumb and forefinger. The world whips around you swiftly as you are carried into the air, deposited safely on the soft, bouncy skin of her waiting palm. The giant lets off yet another amused giggle to herself which shakes you slightly in her hand, and she points at another area of her hand where the ship she showed off earlier is waiting for you. It doesn't look so miniature anymore. In fact, compared to your (estimated to be at) half-inch stature, you think you're the perfect size to fit inside. "GO AHEAD AND HOP IN, YOU SHOULD FIND EVERYTHING PERFECTLY PROPORTIONAL TO YOU. AS SOON AS YOU'RE BUCKLED IN, WE CAN MOVE ON TO THE NEXT STEP". You manage to climb into the massive cockpit of the now normal-sized ship, and wait to see what happens. You don't have to wait long to find out what that next step is...
15533331.title: A Less Than Fantastic Voyage

choices: "...a little risky, I'll explore the lab for now."
"...perfect."
155333312.content:
"PERFECT! NOW HOLD ON TIGHT." you hear her say. There's a weird sense of movement and you soon realise she's placing the ship on a nearby desk. You watch her step back from the ship, the shrinking device in her hand. She seems giddy with excitement. Then she points the device in your direction and another burst of green light fills your vision. When it clears, you are looking out across a strange and barren land. It doesn't take long to realise that you've been shrunk again, possibly even to a microscopic size. You get the strange and uneasy feeling you know where this is all going... That's when the gigantic face of Kourtney appears in the near distance. She seems to have her head level with the surface of the desk and you surmise she's looking for you.

"WONDERFUL! WITH THAT, YOU'RE FREE TO EXPLORE THE WONDERS OF THE MICROSCOPIC WORLD! BEFORE YOU BEGIN, COULD YOU PLEASE MAKE SURE TO WEAR THE PILOT'S HEADSET? IT WILL ENABLE US TO KEEP IN TOUCH AS YOU TRAVERSE THE MICROVERSE. WOULDN'T WANT TO LOSE YOU SOMEWHERE!" she said.

You did as instructed and tried the headset. "Umm... Hello? So what am I supposed to do exactly?"

"AH, THAT IS ENTIRELY UP TO YOU. YOU ARE SIMPLY TO EXPLORE. EVERYTHING WITHIN THIS LABORATORY IS FAIR GAME. PERHAPS YOU'D LIKE TO SEE THE INNER WIRING OF SOME OF THE COMPLEX MACHINERY OR TAKE A SCENIC TRIP THROUGH MY DIGESTIVE SYSTEM? THE WORLD IS YOURS TO EXPLORE!"

"Wait... what did you just say? Your... digestive system?"

"YES. I MEAN, IT WAS JUST AN EXAMPLE BUT YOU'RE MORE THAN WELCOME TO SEE WHAT HAPPENS INSIDE MY BODY. YOU'D BE JUST ABOUT IN TIME FOR LUNCH." she said. On cue, her belly gurgled loudly. It was certainly loud enough for you to hear, the prolonged groaning echoing through the metallic hull of your vessel.

"I'm sorry... are you suggesting I go inside you?"

"IT'S ONE OPTION. YOU'D BE PERFECTLY SAFE." she backed away from the desk, her massive belly now in view. She cradled her gargantuan gut. "YOU'LL BE THE FIRST PERSON TO HAVE EVER GONE INSIDE THE HUMAN BODY! YOU COULD VENTURE INTO MY STOMACH RIGHT NOW AND BEAR WITNESS AS I EAT MY LUNCH! WHAT DO YOU THINK?"

You took off, piloting the ship towards her massive body. You flew up near her face and remained stationary. "I think that sounds..."
155333312.title: Microscopic Mission

choices: Kourtney has a big lunch
Kourtney has a light lunch
1553333122.content:
"OH, WONDERFUL! AN EXCELLENT CHOICE! WELL, IN YOU GO!" she said, opening her mouth for you. Wasting no time, you flew inside.

"Okay Kourtney, I'm in your mouth..." you said, disbelieving the situation yourself. She had closed her mouth and you found yourself floating in the vast cavern. Lights flared from your ship, enabling you to see in the moist darkness. You guessed they were automatic. Her teeth were great enamel mountains. "This is incredible... one of your teeth is like a mountain to me..."

Her mouth became a sudden hive of activity as she spoke, her voice echoing all around you.

"WELL I DID MAKE YOU REALLY SMALL. SO HOW IS IT BEING INSIDE MY MOUTH?"

"Incredible. But I think I'm ready to go deep down into your belly..." You ventured deeper, approaching her abyssal throat. Then you flew down her gullet, whizzing down into her esophagus. "I've just entered your esophagus."

"YOU'LL SOON BE IN MY STOMACH! I CAN'T BELIEVE IT! I ONLY HOPE MY TUMMY BEHAVES ITSELF..."

"I can hear your heart beating pretty fast."

"I'M EXCITED. YOU'RE ALREADY IN MY CHEST CAVITY!"

"What's more, I think I'm nearing the end..." you say, flying through the last stretch of her esophagus and into her gigantic stomach. It was an enormous fleshy chamber that pulsed and churned. There was no food inside as Kourtney was running on empty. "I made it... I'm in your stomach."

"GREAT! I HOPE YOU'RE COMFORTABLE, BECAUSE YOU'RE GOING TO BE IN THERE FOR A WHILE. I WONDER IF YOU'LL FOLLOW MY DIGESTIVE TRACT TO THE EXIT AND COME OUT TOMORROW DURING A BOWEL MOVEMENT? ANYWAY, I'M JUST ABOUT TO EAT LUNCH. ENJOY THE SHOW!"

You did start to wonder. Given her size, was Kourtney a big eater? You began to fear that her idea of lunch might be more than that of the average woman...
1553333122.title: "...perfect."

choices: Give it a try
Pass
15533331221.content:
You waited nervously in Kourtney's stomach. Hovering through the moist caven, you were in awe. Your silent appreciation of the strange scenery was brought to an abrupt halt when a guttural roar resounded through the Kourtney's belly. "You... really sound hungry... mind telling me what's for lunch?" you tried over the comms.

"WELL TO CELEBRATE THE OCCASSION OF A SUCCESSFUL EXPERIMENT, I DECIDED TO ORDER SOME TAKEOUT. A BURGER, LARGE FRIES, LARGE SODA AND A BUCKET OF CHICKEN. AND BOY DOES IT SMELL GOOD, I JUST HAVE TO DIG IN!"

Before you could protest, Kourtney had begun to eat. You could hear the ominous sound of swallowed food approaching. Huge globs of masticated burger were deposited into the stomach as gastric juices started to meet the incoming meal. Some mashed up fries were next and then a huge deluge of coke, which caught your ship and plunged you under the surface of the growing gastric lake. Your ship bobbed to the surface of the gaseous lake and you watched in awe as Kourtney's stomach got to work.

"MMM! THIS IS GOOD! I CAN ALREADY FEEL IT BUBBLING INSIDE ME AND I'VE BARELY EVEN STARTED! I TOLD YOU IT'D BE AN INTERESTING SHOW! LUCKY YOU, YOU HAVE A VIP PASS! AND TO THINK, YOU'RE ONLY IN MY STOMACH! THE RIDE THROUGH MY LOWER INTESTINE IS GOING TO BE AMAZING!"

You began to worry about what her idea of amazement was. A large gas bubble popped nearby and Kourtney burped.

"EXCUSE ME! YOU'LL BE HEARING A LOT OF THAT OVER THE COURSE OF THE TRIP, FROM BOTH ENDS AT THAT. IT'S ALL PERFECTLY NATURAL THOUGH, NOTHING TO BE EMBARASSED ABOUT!"

She stopped talking to stuff herself with more food. It took about 15 minutes for her to pack away her lunch, signalling her satisfaction with a very loud belch.

"AAAH, DELICIOUS! THAT REALLY HIT THE SPOT! I'M RUBBING MY TUMMY BECAUSE I'M SO BLOATED! HOW'S EVERYTHING GOING IN THERE?"

Her stomach was completely different now. Everything had slowed to a crawl because she had eaten so much. An ocean of stomach acid was now struggling to digest mountains of fast food remains, whilst it seemed thousands of gas bubbles had formed throughout Kourtney's cavernous stomach. Occasionally they would pop and Kourtney would burp, which you found to be a fascinating process from the inside.

"It's all good down here. You must be full, everything is going really slowly. There's a lot of gas in here." you respond.

"THE GAS WILL CLEAR THE MORE I KEEP BURPING AND WHEN IT GOES OUT THROUGH THE OTHER END. I CAN'T WAIT TO DIGEST ALL THAT FOOD, IT'S GOING TO BE SUCH A GREAT EXPERIENCE FOR YOU! YOU KNOW... SINCE MY STOMACH IS SO BACKED UP, IT MIGHT EVEN BE SAFE FOR YOU TO LEAVE THE SHIP AND EXPLORE ON FOOT FOR A BIT... IT'S JUST A SUGGESTION, YOU DON'T HAVE TO. JUST THINK OF WHAT A ONCE IN A LIFETIME OPPORTUNITY IT WOULD BE, TO VENTURE OUT INTO THE VAST WORLD OF MY STOMACH AT MICROSCOPIC SIZE, COMPLETELY UNPROTECTED! WOULDN'T THAT BE INCREDIBLE?"

You paused at her idea.
15533331221.title: Kourtney's Big Lunch

choices: You make it to the ship
You get separated from the ship
155333312211.content:
You gave Kourtney's suggestion some thought and soon realised you kind of liked the idea. Landing on the mushy food surface, you agreed to try it out. "That does sound kinda cool, I guess. I wouldn't want to miss any opportunities whilst I'm part of this experiment." you told her.

"THAT'S GREAT TO HEAR! BE SURE TO TAKE THE HEADSET WITH YOU AND MAKE SURE TO RETURN TO THE SHIP BEFORE THINGS GET STICKY. I'LL TRY NOT TO MOVE AROUND TOO MUCH."

"Okay, I'm heading out." You left the safety of the ship behind for the first time since becoming microscopic and ventured into the alien world of Kourtney's stomach. As soon as you opened the door, the smell hit you hard. The digesting food in Kourtney's belly stank something fierce. The noises of digestion and other bodily functions were much louder and there was an almost oppressive warmth in the air. You stepped out onto the squishy surface of the burger and chicken remnants, the topic squelching beneath your feet. You gazed around the absolutely gigantic stomach and began to walk around.

"Wow... this is just incredible... I'm actually in your stomach!"

"YOU'VE BEEN IN MY STOMACH FOR NEARLY AN HOUR NOW, SILLY GOOSE! BUT YES, I IMAGINE IT'S A LOT MORE VISCERAL NOW! OOH, I CAN FEEL A BURP COMING!"

There was a thunderous roar as Kourtney burped.

"SORRY, I COULDN'T HOLD IT IN!"

"That's okay, it wasn't that bad. It's kinda cool seeing you burp from the inside."

"OH, YOU LIKE THAT DO YOU? WELL, I'M HAPPY TO OBLIGE IN THAT CASE! YOU KNOW, I'M FEELING VERY BLOATED AND HAVE SO MUCH GAS IN THIS BIG TUMMY OF MINE! I'D BEEN HOLDING BACK THIS WHOLE TIME BUT IF YOU LIKE IT, I'M GONNA KEEP BURPING! I'M KIND OF GLAD YOU'RE INTO VORE AS WELL! I WAS TRYING TO GET YOU INTO MY BELLY FROM THE START, SO I'M GLAD YOU CAUGHT ON! I WAS ORIGINALLY GOING TO PUT YOU IN MY FOOD AND EAT YOU THAT WAY BUT YOU WERE WILLING TO EXPLORE MY STOMACH ANYWAY! I EVEN THOUGHT ABOUT SWALLOWING YOU WITHOUT THE SHIP! YOU NOTICED MY BELLY RIGHT AWAY THOUGH, IT IS PRETTY BIG AND ROUND! I BET YOU'RE SO GLAD TO BE IN THERE! MMM IT FEELS SO GOOD KNOWING I HAVE A MICROSCOPIC PERSON INSIDE OF MY BELLY!"

You were caught off guard by her sudden remarks. Vore? What the hell was she talking about?

"You okay Kourtney?"

"I'M FANTASTIC! OH WE'RE GOING TO HAVE SO MUCH FUN! I SHOULD LET YOU WALK AROUND ON MY BELLY WHEN YOU GET OUT! GOOD GOD, JUST THE THOUGHT OF IT IS MAKING ME EXCITED! OOH, I'M GONNA BURP AGAIN!"

The stromach trembled as she burped again.

"OH YEAH! THAT FEELS GOOD! YOU ENJOYING YOURSELF IN THERE? I'M LOVING THIS! I CAN'T WAIT TO POOP YOU OUT TOMORROW! OH, I CAN'T TAKE THIS ANY MORE!"

"Whoa, go easy Kourtney! Wh t the hell is going on out there?"

The stomach suddenly shifts all around you and you get the feeling something bad is about to happen. Kourtney has stood up and is on the move! You struggle in the shifting environment to get back to your ship, all the while Kourtney's burps continue to explode around you...
155333312211.title: Expedition in the Stomach

choices: She goes straight to bed
She decides to have some fun
1553333122112.content:
You saw the ship a few metres away and watched in horror as it sank into the mush that once supported it. With a weird gastric blorp, the ship disappeared into Kourtney's stomach juices. "Crap! The ship! Kourtney, the ship is gone!"

Kourtney rubbed her gut as she walked. "IT'S FINE, THE SHIP IS STILL INSIDE ME. IT WON'T BE DIGESTED, SO IT'LL JUST COME OUT IN MY POOP. I'M HEADING HOME FOR A LITTLE MORE PRIVACY SO DON'T BE AFRAID TO EXPLORE MY BELLY. DON'T GO SWIMMING IN ANY OF MY GASTRIC JUICES THOUGH!"

"Kourtney please! This is serious!" you tried, the rumbling chaos persisting in her stomach.

"YOU'LL BE FINE! >URP< THERE'S NOTHING TO WORRY ABOUT, I'M SURE THE SHIP WILL RESURFACE BEFORE IT GETS INTO MY INTESTINES! >URP< OOOH THAT FEELS SO GOOD! HECK I MIGHT EVEN >URP< END UP BURPING YOU OUT AT THIS >URP< RATE!"

The burps continued to explode around you, shaking everything in the woman's stuffed belly. You decided you had little control of the situation and decided to go along for now. You started to wander in her vast belly.

"WHEN I GET HOME, THE REAL FUN CAN BEGIN! OF COURSE I'LL NEED TO PASS YOU FIRST, WHICH MIGHT NOT HAPPEN UNTIL MORNING. YOU COULD BE IN THERE FOR SEVERAL DAYS! DON'T WORRY THOUGH, YOU WILL GET OUT EVENTUALLY! ONCE I POOP YOU OUT, I'LL RETRIEVE YOU FROM MY STOOL AND WE CAN GET RIGHT INTO SOME OTHER FUN THINGS, LIKE LETTING YOU RUN AROUND ON MY BARE BELLY OR SWIM IN MY BATHTUB! HECK, I'LL LET YOU SWIM IN A GLASS OF WATER AS I DRINK IT!"

You partly dreaded her activity choices but were also slightly intrigued. She eventually got home and from there, things got even more interesting as...

155333333.title: Something wrong with her?

choices: "People around me get hurt..."
"My whole body starts to change..."
1553333331.content:
The door opens and a few figures stand just out of view. The first one to come into the room with you is a blonde nurse, dressed in dark blue scrubs with her hair tied back in a bun. She’s wearing glasses and gripping a chart, holding it up to her face. She asks you your name and you announce it, letting her cross it off her checklist. She looks up at you and smiles saying “Very well. We can begin now.” You tell her you’re nervous because you’ve never been an experiment of any kind before and she just laughs and says “Oh no, you’re mistaken. You’re not the experiment here. She is.” You look back at the door and see a girl being wheeled in by two orderlies. She is a young black girl, somewhere around 20 or 21, and she’s got long frizzy hair that looks unwashed for many days. She’s wearing worn out gray scrubs and her hands are being held together by zip ties. She appears to be asleep, and you can tell by the iv marks in her hand that she must be put under a lot. The nurse checks with the orderlies for a second and asks when her last medication was taken. They tell her sometime around midnight the previous night. With a satisfied smirk, the nurse says “Excellent. She should be coming out of it soon. Then this should work right on time.” She sets up a camera in the corner and points at you saying “Stay right there. The experiment will begin very shortly and you are a very important part of it.” You ask her what exactly you’ll be doing and she just shrugs and says “We’re not sure. That’s what you’re going to find out for us.” Just then, the girl in the chair starts to wake up from her medically induced sleep. The nurse sees this and immediately snaps for the orderly’s attention. She points to the girl’s hands and makes a snipping motion with her fingers. The orderly nods and goes to the girl’s chair, and using a surgical knife cuts away at the zip tie, freeing her hands. The orderlies and the nurse immediately rush towards the door. Before it shuts, the nurse looks at you and shoots you a thumbs up, mouthing the words “Good luck.” You begin to think this wasn’t worth the day’s pay.

The girl opens her eyes and squints in the bright lights of the office. She looks at you and has an inquisitive look on her face. “Who… Who are you?” You introduce yourself and ask her name. She responds that her name is Grace. She looks down at the ties on her hands and says “I’m still here… i’m… still in the hospital aren’t I?” You say that you’re in a laboratory and that they said she was part of an experiment. The girl looks at you and says “Do… Do you work here?” You say you guess so, you’re just here for the day. She looks around the room and says “This room… I’ve been here before. My nurse… she takes me here sometimes… but i don’t remember why.” She looks down at her hands again and grunts from a headache as she notices the zip tie marks around her arms. She looks up at you and says “Was I tied up or something? What are these from?” You tell her she had ties on her hands when she came in and she readjusts herself in the wheelchair. She begins to move her legs and plants her uncovered feet firmly on the ground. Using her hands she slowly lifts herself off of the seated position, and stands on wobbly legs. She looks like she’s about to fall and you rush in and grab her, stopping her from slipping forward. She smiles up at you as you reposition her into a standing form. She regains her balance and says “Thanks for that… I almost… uh….” A strange look crosses her face as if a million thoughts are firing at once. She looks around quickly and starts to breathe heavier. You get scared for her and go to comfort her in some way but she just holds a hand out towards you and her face drops as she makes eye contact with you. “Oh god… I remember now… i remember why i’m here… you need to get out of here.” With a worried tone you start looking at the door and ask her why. She holds her head, trying to fight off another headache as she says “It’s hard to explain… but it’s almost like there’s another side of me… and when it comes out…
1553333331.title: Grace is the experiment.... not you!

info.brief_description: Every genre of F/m shrinking fantasy will be represented.  Go ahead.  Take the experiment.
info.description:
You are down on your luck, out of work, and looking for money. An ad in the paper says that they are willing to pay top dollar to anyone willing to take part in a week long study. You figure you have nothing to lose and take part in the experiment. But even on the first day, you notice the program includes a test that changes your perspective on a much... LARGER scale.

- This is a fully fledged shrinking fantasy based around giant women and small men. SW and male growth can happen in accordance with the story, but shouldn't be the focus of the story. Lesbians are okay, but please no Male on Male action.

- The temperament of the giantess can be gentle and caring or rough and abusive depending on their personality. This is the only story I've written where i will allow for character death and story ends rather than continuous storytelling, but don't just end things suddenly and abruptly. And also let the story progress a few chapters before the story ends. Give more opportunity for different branches for each character.

- Size range can go anywhere from a few inches shorter to microscopic sized. The main idea behind the story is to have every way a person can be fictionally shrunk represented in a thread. And although it starts off clearly science-centric, there are mystical elements that can be included as well. While one scientist may base the experiment around a shrink ray or a special potion, another may have a strange artifact that introduces an other worldly being or some sort of dark magic. It doesn't have to make total sense. It's fantasy.

- NO ONE SENTENCE CHAPTERS. I appreciate detailed writing, and any contributions on my end will be at least a paragraph per chapter.
Additions should follow the same, or they will be edited.

- Sexual content is perfectly fine, but as a personal preference please NO SCAT OR WATERWORKS. There's tons of stories that focus on that specifically, and they'll do it better.
